title: Derealization 3 years hopeless
content: Ive derealization past 3 years Ive seen people internet describe occasional Ive 247 stop disassocating completely random moments without actual pattern know Im vulnerable disassociating whenever think hard something like school work socializing top also crazy anxiety issues heart beating fast almost time something completely unrelated ruined life completely suicidal thought moments serious panic attacks since August last year started understand derealization disassociation made feel better sympathizing slightly improved condition since confused 2 months ago read best way treat things like hobbies engaged even though Im disassociating think might disassociate nothing really snap whenever Im disassociating passes eventually although pushing engaged even though Im afraid might disassociate worked Nobody family knows condition dont seek therapist Im scared tell family second dont even know find one doesnt cost money parents control purchases cant Another reason Im disassociating time dont power try find professional help Overall dont really see much assurance Im know slow takes many months recover 2 months since started pushing kept active Im close graduating high school Im scared future Im scared Ill keep years finally see therapist Hopefully someone good advice feel nothing clueless hopeless future next years

title: 27 supposed feel hopeless
content: turned 27 November struggling since Okay maybe Ive struggling years 27 feels like part movie entirety lead youre edge seat anticipation Thats feel least outside probably seem figured good paying job Im happy career choice got engaged good friends yet still find happiness eluding Ive never one put lot stock material world perceives people perceive general Im okay Im confident skin still cant shake feeling uncertainty gotten way worse since birthday days wake dark cloud go bed still Dont get wrong days dark cloud lets little sunshine thats still never get full scope sun shining skin always overcast honest starting lead towards thoughts suicide Im seriously considering havent struggled thoughts past feels different normal circumstances something inconvenient happen life ie death close one Ill get sad gets better know normal stuff year though unlike anything Ive really experienced like good things happening yet still feel shitty inside driving crazy Im aware enough realize theres people planet WAYYY harder Theres people suffering everywhere throwing pity party god knows doesnt make sense find waking every morning throwing costume easier pretend explain awful feeling Im talk hate life want die foreign things going way still feel bummed inside always hard get better dont know much longer keep facade explain thing Im feeling Ive tried talking fiance get run mill advice slap instances realize sound ungrateful advice really doesnt make feel better often find agreeing dont speak loud anymore parents forget Theyre equipped deal something like father quick dismiss sort mental health related conversations mother advise go see professional crazy suggest makes feel unheard unseen Hence costume carry around closet guys think doomed

title: Felt overwhelmed might first anxiety attack seeing photo girlfriend
content: Hi everyone Im writing work trying keep together feel like Im falling apart inside Last night saw picture girlfriend nightclub looked happy hugging friend big smile surrounded people clearly great time happy love want best life reason image hit like truck felt pain chest deep loneliness like everything inside collapsed couldnt sleep felt like crying tears wouldnt come Underneath heavy pressure like rage helpless frustration dont know anxiety attack Ive never really one felt intense overwhelming way Ive never experienced Like body mind completely hijacked havent told know every right go fun Im trying control triggered something cant fully explain jealousy usual sense like feel left behind Like shes glowing Im fading made question everything Im life context moved Canada work 20 Im almost 23 live small city without many people age Ive always someone enjoyed alone could great time Thats whole thing confuses Ive never felt lost like first time feel like Im nobody disappeared one would notice Thanks much reading dont really anyone feel comfortable opening getting already helps

title: keep voices overwhelming
content: new gf 2 months 2 horrible sad terrifying hopless months voices Recently gf found bipolar II whats causing auditory hallucinations part shes able keep voice back mind day night night get right scary 95 time voices take sound parents voices could sound muffled like happening room times voices moving directions circling like pray bad times screaming volume amplifies tries ignore head phones nights shes fetal position shaking even fall asleep body still shaking Im seeing unfold every day every night theres nothing worse seeing person u love going agony wishes death knowing theres nothing take way best really Im trying learn bipolar listen reasure hearing isnt happening hold till stops crying try make smile keep distracted wake drop hate needs anything tell shes nightmares kiss whisper okay Im dont sleep well anymore cause Im waking cause hear crying wakes cause shes scared Majority time doesnt want sleep feels better hearing Im awake playing fortnite lol Luckily Im going alone wonderful cat Cheeto literal angel one best souls planet helping sometimes tag team effort Im home whatever reason handles well sometimes better success times shes dissociating completely gone body walk reach tap shoulder press head arm shes bed lay chest apply pressure shes hitting hes comes gets pet instead never taught behavior new instinctually needed Sometimes worst Im holding cheetoes rubbing andor sitting eventually feel safe calm seriously fear day dies completely destroy feel might lose Shes seeing Drs shes trying find others cause good fit medication shes trying isnt working dont listen try medication often says feels running time Im fucking scared want happy whatever normalcy possibly summary theres lot worse things happened thisSo ask tips tricks anyone help manage voices distract

title: 20 years old feeling worthless
content: Hi 20 year old male struggling place world almost Christmas feelings worthlessness creeping back background graduated high school 2023 time 18 much different today Throughout school struggled maintaining even average GPA would often procrastinate take shortcuts pass classes always like somehow managed graduate though thanks help teachers appreciate dearly immediately jumped college jumped majors struggled complete work general education classes would trouble focusing texts would regress old procrastinating ways stress would build eventually led dropping college completely hated time couldnt take would often get extra help throughout school sure entirely possible autism spectrum Throughout years school since elementary heard talk regarding behavior class always little different even admit isnt excuse anything thought would important background information adult man sure dont feel like one often say Comparison thief joy think definitely true case compare peers often feel embarrassed ashamed much ahead life perspective least Right applying jobs havent luck whatsoever learning drive procrastinating getting license wellshocker think lazy unmotivated person always start strong goals ends every time wish could change wish self esteem higher dont know change things dont even know Im posting honestly needed vent really badly

title: SportExercise Burnout Mental Health
content: Hi everyone Im 32 year old female Ive CrossFit two years absolutely love box community amazing Ive made great friends ideal schedule 4 WODs per week Im kind person give 110 every session Unfortunately last year health taken bad turn Ive really bad fatigue sleep issues dizziness bad anxiety depression Im undiagnosed ADHD think cause flare symptoms feel terrible days gym even good sleep eating clean Im constantly fight flight mode Ive countless blood tests body scans done say Im healthy Ive come conclusion Im overtraining Ive finally decided absolute struggle need give body time recover overwhelming worries Im concerned may rush back WOD soon Ive come realise almost like addiction biggest concerns Ive built reputation dedicated strong top performer Ill forgotten others come outperform Im away Ill lose gains skills need take several months away wont look toned muscular Ill lose mind nothing fill time nothing focus achieve work office every day hate job Im struggling get interviews new one friends gym forget dont see every day Ill maybe miss informal invites socialise Ive always struggled making friends dont want lose unclear long take feel better return CrossFit period time get unwell never able perform level Im scared Ive done permanent damage bodymind wont ever fully recover Id really appreciate advice address worries avoid intense exercise tips talk want avoid flare ups anxiety depression time shared experience Id love hear Much love

title: addiction one talks aboutWhy cant stop craving approval
content: need people approve us badly Even know validate theres still itch hear Youre great see value dont get doubt creeps wild think Logically know external validation shouldnt define us psychologically wired seek Humans social creaturesour brains literally designed seek approval human history survival depended accepted group Feeling excluded wasnt rejection death sentence back day yeah runs deep heres gets tricky rely much external validation give people control feel praise youre top world dont suddenly youre doubting everything Thats dangerous cycle end chasing approval rather building real selfworth Selfvalidation hand like internal muscleyou strengthen time able say Im proud trust judgment without needing round applause confirm less dependent become whether people give stamp approval thoughts

title: Delayed SSRI withdrawal new

title: leave comfortable sixfigure job homeless Im 27 brink losing hope Life needs change need end
content: Hello hope dont end writing opening getting crickets Putting words may therapeutic thought give shot dont post Reddit even though Ive consumer years first genuine attempt connect others platform feel like title speaks nonetheless provide much context within reason hopes allow fruitful discussion possible Ill share details background dilemma currently find goes nothing Thanks reading know lot HighLevel Overview Im 27 decent tech sales position allows great flexibility income work solely home Company India dont enjoy sell analytics software big medical institutions Yawn live Midwest winter almost 8 months year deeply unsatisfied life prospects future Im goodlooking guy solid aboveaverage social skills Im straight single real ambition start dating even though attractive women check public relatively often recently cut Marijuana diet altogether everyday user past 10 years Im currently 4 weeks clean Im definitely sharper dont feel different emotionally without weed Ive mentallyemotionally years drop rat race homeless Would happier simple life go camping somewhere mountains beach south never come back think would satisfying would make life worth living would excited wake every day thats something creative like author musician Life doesnt feel like adventure older Ive gotten think selfdeletion terms desperate depressive emotional act rather cold calculated pragmatic solution Im sad time stretch imagination friends live state like Florida attended college dont talk much even dont feel close like wish sobering reality dont want necessarily greatest threat existence age 45 statistically speaking Background family uppermiddle class grew one wealthiest areas region family extremely academic uncle graduated Harvard runs hedge fund younger cousins graduated Princeton dad holds two masters degrees hand associates degree music lol didnt go college Would basically disowned LOT time nannies babysitters played sports travel leagues soccer basketball made varsity basketball high school also huge nerd playing World Warcraft Magic Gathering able fit multiple circles never one truly belonged relationships people transient lot trouble school relationship parents emotional often rebelled therapy thrown different meds since age 7 8 Im either one things right age 17 sent wilderness therapy program unknowingly admitted parents woken 300 two strangers room said flight leaves two hours cant take anything Next thing knew middle backcountry Utah Colorado next 25 months hiking around 710 atrisk youths introduced spirituality first time learned meditate changed life try get back closest thing saw civilization time dirt roads occasional wooden fence cattle magical scary transformative eyeopening experience Ive ever Mother Nature best antidepressant however sent boarding school place disciplinary hell hole filled kids overdosing campus dealing drugs involved gangs generally courtordered hand emotional issues worked wilderness experience Needless say wasnt great place transition back normal life got many fights time couldnt go take piss without people following fight bathroom Im total victim felt like lot prove Essentially place Juvi rich kids went college got degree Didnt use degree Got sales jobs Got better sales job Question mentioned family overachievers subconsciously always compare know Im capable high income dont feel successful accomplished time life felt really connected truly free experience wilderness hiked journaled thoughts day time world stare starry nights ponder big questions cant tell badly want go back time deeply miss person Words cant describe longing anything close experience pretty savvy investing couldnt live dividends unless put away 80 income next 10 years Ive considered rental arbitrage buying renting property well cant imagine 10 years Im wondering selling worldly possessions pursuing nomadic lifestyle nature crazy idea obviously completely ludicrous one family think Im depressed touch dont know Im asking right questions Im going crazy Im unrealistic Make mistake truly think may well homeless rather continue grind everelusive idea financial freedom know Im blessed fact less invalidates hurt yearning deeper richer fulfilling life point need radical shift better worse x200B Give thoughts cant talk friends family freely x200B Love Thanks taking time

title: Symptoms stress depression mental block getting older cant imagine future children feeling like empty shell emotionally disconnected watching life go side line feeling like dont care wake tomorrow
content: TLDR felt anger resentment old job long time got new one solution turned worse Simultaneously M30 GF F28 brought children life altering decision switched job better consequences symptoms stress depression feel like empty shell feel like brain melting trying process thoughts future children like getting older generally see future motivation feel drive aware existence feel like watching life side line aware actions something feel like watching sideline like outside shell walking around auto pilot real stuck inside knowing feel sad empty memories feel like different life different dont feel like getting older havent done long time brain feels like melting try process thoughts future relatable really really trying hard imagine Universe infinite simply isnt possible comprehend thought Sometimes feel like dont care wake tomorrow scared thought scares Post hope might time provide input moved away family different city study 19 Initially wanted move back soon possible kept pushing moving date started liking new city Got lot friends generally enjoyed eventually told would move back graduated time University met GF moved together year later every fine graduated years behind graduationwise even though initially wanted move back many long fun discussions ultimately decided stay new city close many friends gained figuring could visit family weekends close friends daily basis turned great Fast forward years joined company thought equalled dream job perfect long time started overworked 5060 hour weeks ongoing basis almost year tried raising flag saying much nothing happened started resenting job much refused work absolutely ultimately resigning start new job new job solution however turned worse end scale absolutely nothing agreements agreed upon interviews department wasnt welcoming thus left quite quickly symptoms depression started much quieter generally sad miserable enjoying time Eventually state would break crying several times week realizing something seriously wrong went doctor tests showed stress symptoms symptoms moderate depression light severe afterwards therapist However done nothing Nothing feel empty inside emotions dont really feel joy happiness body facade trapped inside autopilot almost like separate brain aware everything initial brain thinks second one really part initial one aware actions thoughts plans really feel part feel like parallel things real stuck inside talk therapist aware feel like watching talking therapist talking entirely different background feel like therapy could easily witchcraft way therapist tell wants judge asses using input relating world cant cant see earth talking make rest go away cant comprehend thoughts future brain stops working Thinking back dont feel like aged either dont feel age getting older brain melts trying accept fact 40 50 60 etc someday simply cant imagining cant imagine life children like life altering event baby one thing think ahead imagining 15 year old children brain simply cant process thoughts think want children quite sure think would pretty sure didnt want children ie much children fact cant seem think process thoughts GF brings asking thoughts means want pressure healthy financial state issue Actually objective criteria ready motivation feel detached cant really describe frustrating saddening know get one life enjoying mine way suicidal time time think wouldnt wake tomorrow wouldnt really care fact thought waking doesnt scare scares talk GF really supportive however much still get sad cries time time without able say exactly fun state cant see change im really sure started somewhat foggy mental state Im x200B x200B x200B

content: 27 yo woman Netherlands thus far holiday large organized groups immediate family latter always abusive never physical diagnosed twice light autismASS mother would get extremely angry sometimes literally nothing probably ASS also narcissistic tendencies autism would make intensely afraid especially became angry would literally drive corners causing bad meltdowns used describe believed hell hell would like shaped life teenager minimize chance getting angry lot say wont get caused trust issues made life today extremely lonely literally told anyone happened home around 25 always felt needed defend mother extremely unreliable One thing always wished younger made jealous others go holiday friends always guilted going holiday parents sister gone amazing places always interesting things holidays always planned minute mother always lot arguing going small things went wrong expected However trust issues unabsolved fear rejection never real friends dared invite anything let alone holiday life got better started university could go trips study association day still trust issues fear rejection never holiday except large groups family work software developer year invited two colleagues go 2week trip far away place eaten two colleagues times one work every day nice relaxed guy one superficial relationship one organizing everything local one places going lot experience travelling world experience faraway part doesnt really bother excite much maybe would people two colleagues possibly future friends inviting part makes sick nerves never friend rarely invited anything small group let alone 2week holiday take invite

title: Reason Live Breakup
content: Hello dont really know start Ive worst time life feel like Im going hurt worse background Im 17 transgender woman recently moved attend new school 2 hours hometown Im socially confident person havent made many connections new school since started last September December time met boy LGBTQ club Id joined moment Id met love know older people view teens say theyre love first romantic experience knew felt different started talking began meet teach crochet month started dating imagined romantic dates beach made feel incredibly special Ive struggled mental health particularly depression well unstable home life abusive father time Id moved school Id unbearably depressed almost 2 years without friends Id even attempted take life 2020 feeling someone seemed really care amazing dated 8 weeks 24th April inviting around place broke said worried incompatibility causing issues us future devastated love blame leaving said wanted friends hasnt reached since breakup Ive continued spiral since miss feel alone time going school feels Im even flying autopilot every moment hurts dont think knows much effected though heard mutual friend feeling guilty hed upset makes feel even worse despise everything Id prettier would left less awkward affectionate Funnier Less loner want back itll never happen dont know reason get reason live felt safe arms Ill never feel way Ill never speak said wanted friends many would want freak like pushed edge every day doesnt message want get together pushes farther dont look go days without eating sleeping dont take meds makeup cuz dont want alive days sleep Im even tired preferable consciousness Ive become suicidal past week step traffic last Thursday walk bus stop stepped railing bridge came close letting go wouldve easy finally peace thing stops hope hed take back day doesnt happen closer come need help probably care one else mom certainly doesnt Thank giving space talk Brina 3

title: psychiatrist prescribed Vortioxetine 5 mins 21M engineering student
content: Hey everyone Ive struggling years thought could ADHD something similar finally working courage see psychiatrist left feeling confused helped Id really appreciate advice shared experiences symptoms FocusAttention brain feels like browser 100 tabs open Ill sit study blink suddenly 3 hours gonewith nothing done Time evaporates Motivation Even tiny tasks like watching 10minute lecture writing lines code feel like climbing mountain procrastinate guilt unbearable Mental State Constantly exhausted stuck head hours selftalk frustrated hard normal things feel Social Anxiety Sweating buckets around people zero social life paralyzing indecision even picking eat stressful hospital experience prepared whole list symptoms discuss doctor skimmed asked maybe 2 questions prescribed Vortioxetine 5 minutes looked later saw antidepressantnot expected since wondering ADHD discussion side effects explanation antidepressant Take 5mg week 10mg month come back later warning potential side effects looked later saw stuff sexual dysfunction nausea etckinda frightened doubts 1 anyone taken Vortioxetine similar issues help focusmotivation mood 2 initially get misdiagnosed depression get reevaluated 3 Meds combo Im already Azathioprine Crohnsanyone 4 Im torn giving med fair shot maybe depression causing symptoms feeling dismissed Traveling different huge effort cant afford wasted trips

title: SSRI Alternative AnxietyPanic Disorder

title: high school counselor let keep cutting ended mental hospital
content: first possibly post wanted share story handful mental health issues high school didnt know cope One day friends caught binder spine ripped bent point snapped half used sharp edges cut wasnt deep given tool using self harm nonetheless history self harm since middle school wasnt new friends saw dragged school counselor didnt want told woman lets call Ms Smith cutting pulled broken binder spine purse show using didnt want take away since unhealthy comfort Deep though wanted help knew bad needed stop shock horror didnt care talked asked gave basic answer wanted reality didnt feel comfortable sharing stranger needed release Seeing blood coming cut anything felt like emotions couldnt get released didnt think would make sense anyone never told Thinking back Im glad never told Ms Smith talking minutes also told lot suicidal thoughts asked ready go back class felt like punch gut didnt care hurting didnt try take away tool using wanted focus school leave alone made loose much faith people supposed help felt like couldnt trust anyone help didnt want stop also really makes sense told Ms Smith wasnt ready wanted kill wanted die didnt care one care told called parents dad available pick gave dad run talked went home Dad wanted stay talk hurting much Ms Smith handled really open dad Instead got angry mom world angry friends making go Eventually dad took home told mom practically shut later learned called therapist asked heck therapist told keep eye brought suicide take hospital Instead comforting trying help parents made manual labor said going skip school going work instead time hurting much daughter dark place handled way shouldnt know much regret forced dig fire pit back yard hated every second already going one became job dig feeling suicidal school got boyfriend called ask gone crap boyfriend phone also moved helping mom sort costumes basement ignoring mom talking loudly enough hear told boyfriend parents didnt care wanted work feeling suicidal almost broke mom dad best knew lo behold mentioned suicide Mom told dad get ready taking hospital boyfriend told lock bathroom couldnt take bit eventually came given got car dad told mom sit back seat couldnt try hurt years since memory still breaks heart angry would never hurt parents day first time ever seen dad cry isnt emotional person seeing hurt worse everything else feeling drove ER checked Eventually taken back room nurse asked sorts questions going wish lied wish told nurse fine made stupid mistake honest told parents needed go behavioral institution lets real mental hospital one available beds three hours away Mom looked place see like voiced concerns terrible reviews Years later talked told wished put foot told daughter wasnt going go hospital staff brought paper scrubs change Paper Freaking Scrubs could keep underwear bra underwear paper scrubs humiliating top everything else driven mental hospital back police car parents following behind officer nice asking wanted listen radio temperature okay told fine spent whole three hours silently sobbing finally arrived nut house late night crazy people asleep nurse offered sad ham sandwich diet ginger ale dinner day cannot drink association place parents gave tearful goodbye told love couldnt say back couldnt speak taken room another girl already asleep told would woken 6am vitals checked Im morning person like perpetually exhausted chicken news another thing top everything else made day worst life could barely sleep night security camera room watching roommate still fear security cameras due red cyclops eye always monitoring small bathroom room thin sheet privacy camera aimed way could see silhouette showered used toilet understand need keeping eye us since mental issues still awful suffer mental hospital thing called drop anchor meant residents something get trouble punishment everyone stay rooms unless time eat group therapy torture blessing arrived days drop anchor stayed room like rest nurse told since wasnt trouble didnt better alone mentally messed adolescence wing lobby made days without interact roommate drop anchor lifted forced go gym participate sports meditation group therapy meeting doctor None us allowed sit close Heaven forbid touch hugs even pat shoulder couldnt even legs sitting chair many rules prison place help people dark place needed escape world get help even scheduled bathroom breaks couldnt make bathroom break one day begged nurse unlock door could go told wait got point painful hold sweating almost tears trying hold Finally twenty minutes bathroom break gave trying keep peeing let go room didnt make peed foot away bathroom security camera saw whoever monitoring footage Humiliation stacked misery change clean best could toilet paper since shower supplies locked away came nurses acted like beyond thankful let go early could strangled given visitors day parents came see still angry sending looked relieved see heartbroken mental hospital remember shouting locked storming away Thats regret still havent forgiven though trying lied way day told fill sheet feeling mentally thoughts hurting others course dont want hurt Im perfectly fine cured week locked away made mental issues much better honest would kept longer lied butt free small library borrowed book Hellen Keller remembered reading middle school book kept sane read often could wanted scream shout throw book knew escape said may sound dramatic saying wanted escape would understand place terrible everyone place lock kids instead trying help us heal Hell Mom told whole family title: 2 years ago today biggest downfall life still cant cope LONG PARAGRAPH UNDERSTAND READ EVERYTHING
content: started 2023 turned 14little backstoryi always liked video games like lot never pc always wished one 3 brothers money sideI always used watch big brother play pche always gave permission play wasnt best experiencethe pc old like 2015 could play 1 hour dayit good never satisfied wanted pc decent specs Fast forward april 2023 sold phone unused bed parents got 1200 used buy specs pc Took 2 months get everything dad happily helped build iti finally good pc use happy alot years playing mobile games played much 810 hours dayi noticed didnt go outside much usual started feeling angry games every time gamedbut still healthy physically didnt mind itUntill started care pc getting competitive games like valorant csgoi started punching unity monitor alotmy parents noticed talked telling dont forget hitting things always wished forthose talks workek days untill started raging againthe day finally came broke first monitori sad mom bought new one 1 week latersame thing took less 2 months break second monitorand process repeated untill broke 3rd last monitori noticed decline menthal health decided sell pc buy good phone quit gamesand First 2 months good untill started missing games pci happy sure healthy Sadly brain wouldnt understand slowly going depressioni started buy cigarettes stop stressing little things didnt work used highschool friends escape addictions worked good playing football happythats untill beggining 2024 came got back school fridayweekend comeand felt urge smokeand thought could steal without getting caughti left house without anybody knowing making way storei entered stole 5 packs left runningstore owner cahsed situation ended brawl almost got killedafter punches fell ground head first getting concussioni arrested charged robbery attempted mrderspent 7 months detention center got house arrest mind im waiting conviction got home happy see family againi talked alot always stood togheter everbut video games started make way brain againand urge get pc asap came back last thing happenedi wrote hope people read thisvery rare help guide path interests live happyshould try get pc get rid video games

title: mostbroken leastunderstood rules helpers may invite private contact first resort weve made new wiki explain
content: understand people reply immediately OP invitation talk privately mean help type response usually leads either disappointment disaster usually works quite differently say PM anytime casual social context huge admiration appreciation goodwill good citizenship many support others flag inappropriate content even know many struggling hard work behind scenes information resources make easier give get quality help small start new wiki page explains detail much better respond public comments least youve gotten know someone maintained rdepressionwikiprivatecontact full text current version Summary Anyone acting helper invites accepts private contact Ie PMs chat kind offsite communication early conversion showing either bad intentions bad judgement Either way unwise trust PM anytime seems like kind generous offer might perfectly wellmeaning unless solid rapport established wise idea points consider offer accept invitation communicate privately posting supportive replies publicly youll help people OP responses good quality youll educate inspire helpers 1990 rule applies much anywhere else internet People struggling serious mentalhealth issues often justifiably low tolerance disappointment highlevel everchanging emotional need Unless helper able make 100 commitment every way long necessary offering personal inbox resource likely harm good mentalhealth crisisline responders usually dont give names callers arent allowed request specific responders much healthier safer callers develop relationship agency whole Analogously much safer healthier OPs develop relationship community whole Even trained responders generally allowed work highintensity situations alone partly availability mostly wider perspective preventing compassion fatigue helper gets head someone whose mentalhealth issues including suicidality often comorbid depression escalate PM conversation much harder others including rdepression rSuicideWatch moderators help Contrary common assumptions moderators cant see police PMs observation many years people say PM consistently ones least understanding mentalhealth issues mentalhealth support gaps knowledge ability communicate effectively Community input mitigates limitations Theres reason someone whos truly help would want hide responses community scrutiny helpers concerned privacy keep mind selfdisclosure used supportively feelings details problem use altthrowaway accounts restrictions account age karma know internet used people exploit abuse others people want hide deceptive manipulative responses everyone except victims many specifically target vulnerable mentalhealth issues helper invites OP talk privately gives good supportive experience theyve primed person vulnerable abusers sort cognitive priming tends particularly effective someones state mentalhealth crisis people rely heuristics critical reasoning OPs want talk privately posting wideopen anonymous forum like reddit might best option Although dont recommend allow OPs request private contact asking support want please keep expectations realistic careful look history anyone offers PM opening

title: sixfigure drug dealer broken addict finding life againmy story
content: want share someone might feeling stuck hopeless drowning silence maybe ashamed ask help thats maybe help didnt grow much middle school selling weed survive parents couldnt afford much hated asking things didnt high school making 90 day felt like fortune teenager kept growing got college things took built network across campuses back home sophomore year pulling 400 net profit daily built solid operation years growing customer base Snapchat became fulltime storefront shouldve senior year making around 200000 profit annually sales pure profit workers lawyer retainer apartment two cars Camry blending tuned Mercedes E53 AMG speedy weekends even helped pay chunk parents mortgage thought booming dropshipping business skeptical proud paper winning reality knew stop soon came first big wakeup call One day set make 20000 profit single delivery parents visiting accidentally blocked Camry took E53 AMG Bad choice got pulled exhaust tuned cops saw part mushroom bag peeking seat refused search brought dogs found half pound cocaine multiple pounds weed Molly LSD shrooms sure done lawyer one top guys drug cases state worked magic cost lot charges dropped completely walked court free hole pocket time already using Percocets occasionally take edge wasnt everyday thing yet Still instead seeing arrest warning went right back business raid happened months later apartment door got kicked DEA agents local police department found stash scales packaging whole setup lawyer came got probation time wasnt legal system shut DEA towns police department worked together get Snapchat account permanently banned strictly supervising social media accounts entire pipeline built online business 8 years growing customer base reached far beyond city gone overnight backup account reboots point took sign God stop gave wasnt even motivated try rebuilding Thats depression fully took Suddenly noise life deals adrenaline constant movement went silent got quiet left alone hated saw felt like floating empty space disconnected everything purpose identity hollow version person used like alive invisible nobody could really see broken inside Id lie bed staring ceiling unable sleep unable move replaying failures room would feel smaller every day like walls closing suffocating surrounded people cared felt alone ever didnt want alone also didnt want anyone see like isolated thought deserved suffer Id moments Id get thinking Maybe Ill get together today within hour weight would slam back felt paralyzed mentally physically shame regret anger sat chest like truck couldnt even look mirror without feeling disgust thats percocets started becoming daily thing used occasional turned dependence Within couple weeks spending 250 500 every two days pills less year threw away 80k trying numb self pills got expensive turned heroin couldnt believe snorting heroin something swore Id never touch cheaper point didnt care desperate numbness needed relief relief crushing guilt loss control emptiness parents watched turn shell didnt understand son went helping mortgage locking childhood bedroom barely eating barely speaking wasting away front tried everything Rehabs tough love soft love Every time relapsed could feel hope slipping away fed darkness hated selfloathing unbearable felt like shattered life beyond repair would scroll old pictures better times felt like looking stranger didnt recognize anymore Every time saw someone old life thriving moving forward sank deeper felt stuck quicksand watching world pass years cycle three stints rehab still addict shame isolation selfdoubt like living inside prison built didnt want die didnt really want live either existing Like ghost haunting life parents booked trip overseas family six months away told Id somehow cut wouldnt go full withdrawals trip couldnt taper fast enough left withdrawing hard sweating vomiting trembling trapped skin youve ever felt opioid withdrawals know feels like body soul tearing apart wouldnt wish worst enemy first weeks pure agony tried find help medications needed werent easily available country miracle third week found doctor got something eased symptoms wasnt Suboxone actual withdrawal medication enough help eat function still weak still broken still crying silently night somehow kept going came back home blocked dealers number flushed everything left Ive clean ever since year Looking back raid mightve saved life kept going probably wouldve ended prison shot deal gone bad overdosed alone apartment Six months sobriety started feeling tiny spark faint feeling maybe maybe still future reenrolled college Im working toward degree hardest part wasnt arrests money lost quiet war suffocating depression loneliness heavy made air feel thick selfhate made every day feel like punishment Im proof even place get better little little youre struggling right know even feel like youre bottom even youre ashamed ask help even feels impossible theres still way One day time

title: Insomnia likely depressive personality disorder anxiety lifetime nothing
content: Im 38 depression since kid Doctor said phase nothing worry Havent formally diagnosed dpddisthymia lasts long theres much else Diagnosed depression matters didnt get real support Sleep issues started around 11 12 Head would race every night Took hours fall asleep always tired school Eventually started turning insomnia around 18 6 hours night eventually 3 massive panic attack work nowhere months turned 21 Havent worked since Became hypersomnic years sleeping 1218 hours day absolutely exhausted eventually settled back insomnia 3 hours night less like ever since Anxiety isnt bad days Barely ever leaving house 18 years helped Glad anxiety calmed Getting mini attacks whenever phone would ring someone knocked door tiresome periods tried go back social depression always end Im exhausted physically mentally time cant numb long alone didnt affect much Eventually stopped crying randomly Unfortunately became less numb time body mind cant deal like constantly made everything worse Im fed alone theres nothing energy make friends relationships dont deserve really hard try explain someone youre useless counter youre like somehow fixes wasted best portion life even wasnt choice downhill Drugs dont work depression insomnia least ones Ive tried types antidepressants havent tranquilisers newer insomnia medications melatonin highest dose nothing hate feeling nothing ever going change despite fact way theres point complaining Im never going loved love thing worth living Family apathetic got used many years ago hurts feel could decent partner someone long understood shortcomings doubt Id ever end relationship anyway wouldnt let one could Aside girlfriends back 1819 although could hardly call relationships never hugged anyone meant world incredibly empty lonely tired

title: signs burnout
content: training catering cooking 6 months cant take anymore manage stock production entire shift alone means constantly focused work didnt bother passionate made happy felt like achieving something life past 2 months following accumulation rather dramatic events traumas resurfaced longer able manage position constantly stressed pressure work sleep little go day without eating work due stress 6 months longer social life also family rarely see offbeat lifestyle work consumption cigarettes exploded feel certain sensation relief little things meant little little depression returned wonder signs symptoms potential burnout temporary depression

title: diagnosed burnout keep lashing everybody symptom Sometimes small things nothing

title: Suicidal Thoughts Substance Abuse grief
content: Hey guys Im 21 years old Im diagnosed Bipolar add perspective parents split 3 dad left gave lot insecurity anxiety throughout childhood early teenage years Although never close father still keep contact however unemotional brief however extremely close side family grandmother uncle aunts little step brother 4 months ago grandfather passed away years battle lung cancer man hero first person stand spoke physical abuse gone child always time would come visit grandparents lived separate towns never missed day work 20 years genuinely man idol father figure none didnt fully click watched take last breath never coming back last months Im slowly spiraling person dont know stop substance abuse insane amount suicidal thoughts drinking eating chronic depression inability maintain relationships inability keep job etc uncommon people disorder getting worse worrying wonderful mother beautiful girlfriend aswell friends usual dont know go feel empty inside constantly feel need numb forget tell would ashamed saw wondering anyone similar issues would willing give advice Im big guy 63 190lbs thank god Im small enough physical abuse anymore matter grown feel big Im still broken little boy desperately wants sort head badly wants granda back hope wasnt long hope someone offer advice thank god bless

title: Long term withdrawal symptoms
content: Hi everyone want start saying Im glad group exists Im going give background mental history Im hopes advice struggled depression life Im 31 started taking antidepressants 7 years ago 2018 effexor part worked pretty well real problem felt quite tired problems staying awake day generally feeling tired Fast forward October last year felt stable enough life try getting meds see may help tiredness spoke doctor general physician psychiatrist tapering plan effect lowering dosage 150mg 75 30 eventually entirely course felt sick week week half stopping felt really good going nearly 3 months Im feeling pretty awful days big problems 1 GERD issues often feel super nauseous like need vomit several times vomit nausea stomach issues 2 Im feeling incredibly wiped experiencing ton brain fog hard even think remember things course sleep many hours need feel rested sleep apnea feels differentalso using CPAP also tried eat healthy diet natural organic foods doesnt seem helping also started taking supplements vitamin K2 D3 Folate 15mg Plus Methyl B12 Cofactor general mens multivitamin folateB12 newest addition recommended someone similar situation seemed like may helped brain fogbut Im still feeling tired sick exasperated Lastly know symptoms normally acute short lived go whilemy questions came antidepressants long symptoms last Especially curious effexorvenlafaxine symptoms experience helped remedy problems Thanks everyone time genuinely appreciated really hard time handling feeling quite hopeless

title: cant go like
content: Tw suicide Heyy First sorry make mistakes writing English native language F 29 almost 30 dont know else go Im desperate Ive struggling depression anxiety since teen years took antidepressants almost four years alongside private therapy sessions although enough could afford However medication help gradually stopped taking months ago gradually Everything got worse started feeling pain almost everyday got diagnosed fybromialgia prescribed opioids seem work well since pain wont go away stop working studying Last September enrolled uni order try finish undergraduate degree best attend lessons mostly attendance compulsory much pain since beginning December feeling worse worse dark place right barely keep hygiene cannot cook wasnt sister would starved cannot concentrate study dont see friends call etc Honestly feel like burden complete failure Even chronic illness degenerative one affects tremendously aspects life able work state wont give financial aids supposed pay basic things parents wont always help father almost 70 mother ill stage 4 lynfoma cancer currently receiving radiotherapy stable tho overcome seven years Also besides circumstances hate dependant relationship problematic since teen years dont see point living tried end life two things afraid failing consequences would death would affect family people around general Thank reading appreciate kind support orand help

title: Life unbearable partner friends especially youre physically sick top depressed
content: month ago experienced first seizure Ive ever tonic clonic next terrifying thing ever happen life couldnt turn anyone sort comfortsupport Im alone couple days ended catching Covid first time despite badly ravaged already weakened mindbody still couldnt turn anyone sort comfortsupport Im alone week awful things happened birthday also took place nobody noticed cared Im alone weeks afterwards suffered terribly long Covid additional seizures focal variety throughout could lay arms wrapped around body whispering whatever little comfort could give like man freezing dark clinging tattered blanket warmth past used couple people spoke online depression assortment mental illnesses suffer made isolate completely Ive never IRL friends everything thats happened past month feel like Im scrambling try reach people Im glad say Ive met couple nice individuals way talk much day sit completely alone room lonely scared like Ive never Whats worse though need people pushes away dont want buzzkill desperate clingy needy really hard youre crisis yet regardless doesnt make less repellent normal person unburdened chronic depression couldve least good friends loving partner help whole ordeal instead Ive largely go alone Ive always depressed neurotic havent ability form sort connections people right worst trap life set since crisis hits especially medical variety one else see let tell isnt enough TLDR Depression destroys ability make meaningful connections others turn sets nightmarish future cope major emergencies completely

title: Im 19 girlfriend murdered trial soon Im getting depressive
content: Hi yall Well Im used posting forums feel bad atm cant open family friends therapist even want feel completely unable talk Im 20yo man Im Irish family moved France 5 lived since grew small country village school two classes hardly spoke French got friend quickly Ill call Honey post Honey friends childhood class every year also neighbors played together every day school Year year became bilingual French made lots friends started crush 11 started middle school still class classmates trying get us together pretty shy time didnt dare flirt Finally following year 12 years old got relationship Ofc feelings werent strong grew still young happy first girl kissed one actually kept growing always class every year kept spending time together explain understand 5 19 years almost spent every day life gradually became essential breathing years went serious important us relationship became never argue ofc sometimes didnt agree knew put differences aside respect point view 15 started high school time relationship almost three years people amazed longevity couple age unusual loved much still love much like found perfect person dont want speak felt like perfect kept growing first time together others never sex another girl wrote long love letters pretext good say much loved mean Im kinda clich chunk rugby player people dont really imagine yet Id done anything everything exceptional felt incredibly privileged part life graduated high school summer moved apartment started university glad live sleep every night course parents let us sleep together weekends holidays wasnt new step relationship happy explained new mates university girlfriend 6 years stunned asked never wanted flirt another girl anything answer always since childhood grew alongside exceptional girl always dreamed felt lucky relationship never even noticed girl found perfect every way happy want tell little bit great person heart warmed couldnt stand injustice always wanted help others kind caring Whenever friends needed advice support something one call full wisdom good intentions always smiling illuminated peoples lives presence funny person well always saw bright side everything positive never gave worked hard reach goals clever Id even say brilliant gifted student passionate something put whole heart made people feeling special knew bring best always complimented everyone adorable also sensitive hated seeing ugly things world could cry also someone made world beautiful mere presence Ive never met someone selfless altruistic also incredibly beautiful beautiful woman Ive ever seen angel friends family family loved mam three sons used say Honey like daughter little brother kinda hooligan younger listened neither parents spent much time helping really took control life Everyone loved literally wonderful someone loved pamper people could spend weeks making gift surprise someone always embarrassed someone gived gift think one people sincere said preferred give receive felt good love life literally always wondered could love much mean Im bad always best especially much better yet still looked like one wonder world happy 19 years old yet saw life saw life lots plans even beyond great person young life ahead mean broken itd incredibly hard least would kept existing living shining deserved cannot bear happened together happy love never could believed disappear quickly brutal way one deserves happens someone close someone love much extremely harsh Sunday parents weekend Sometimes weekends slept together sometimes slept spent day together Saturday evening slept parents mine wasnt even particular reason Sunday morning wanted run hour offered lazy tired wanted stay bed hour absurd studying sports science lazy go running Id never forgive ongoing case Im allowed speak detail anyway doesnt violently assaulted tortured died body burned Suspects arrested weeks later Feb 2019 trial supposed May 2020 postponed coronavirus France quarantine cannot even describe infinite pain felt days disappearance important research carried body finally found knew happened blackout Since woke fading away taking heavy psychotropes doesnt prevent constantly anxiety attacks take fuck ton sleeping pills sleep otherwise awful nightmares never thought Ill fall low one day always someone happy fullblown never thought love life going murdered one day either havent going university since dont anything except think day saw lot therapist say shit supposed accept sudden death person love world grew believing going spend lives together tell emotions mourning emotions deep feelings hopelessness hatred towards feel even worse since know reasons people knew feel devastated Sometimes want kill sometimes want avenge killing feel unable inflict pain parents friends Honeys parents friends long time neighbors help lot hold since happened see fear kill state parents Honey parents suffering much lost daughter dont know relieve pain Whenever speak seem happy sudden say Honey kept living imo true longer lives never lives miss much know say miss much missed everyone knew wonderful always miss People tell one day Ill happy Ill meet someone else go back normal life know wrong first Ill never happy supposed live without growing essential breathing unbearable survive since shes longer resume normal life meet someone else never wanted happy meet someone else isnt Im desperate without Ill want meet someone plus irreplaceable feel devastated one want yet know shell never come back constantly think laughter smile scent bought perfume spray pillow every day know stupid thing helps sleep little better wanna hug Sometimes people lose loved one say regret telling much mean least Im relieved Honey knew much loved important passed away told every day quarantine commemoration one year death everyone looked pity longer go class rugby see friends dont see anyone seen people several months dazed appearance hadnt realized actually became shadow always strong Im extremely bony depressed even see many people seemed concerned saw Thats avoid friends dont know say understand thats normal place wouldnt know say either theyre also embarrassed know tell person used open Honey deal difficult emotions without knowing open painful family trying support much hard bad atmosphere home much parents broke father went back Ireland older brother feel like mom little brother dont know anymore dont know either think trial Ill go Ireland well take break every time go everyone aware happened throughout region even outside recognize look pitying air depresses even Im afraid judgement know theyll long sentence Im afraid trial week two hear detail day see murderers hear theyre going say Im anxious cannot bear moment Im trying think spend time tree hut father built gardens younger spent time teenagers parents didnt want us sleep together secretly met stayed night Everything remained Im feel calmer feel like nothing ever ease pain dont even know came tell story needed open cant loved one dont think anyone read anyway

title: Im worthless leech society
content: title says Im angry depressed lazy worthless leech society past years Ive turned really nasty person Im point nothing really brings joy anymore everything hopeless lost mom April 2019 3 weeks high school graduation devastated mental health went steep decline move grandparents moms side werent really emotionally supportive would often ridicule behaving certain way brother half brother move across country live abusive dad minor time courts ruled father Knowing dad mom sickens think fact brother maybe Im overreacting seems well Went college fall semester things went left quickly depressed didnt bother showing classes would spend financially refund bunch junk food keep mind occupied depression also huge slob would barely clean room point would RA constantly held dirty dorm well roommate would complain thing didnt care anything Often posted suicidal social media point police would regularly knock door check every time someone knocks cant help feel heart begin race rapidly Covid hit eventually move back grandparents still emotionally unsupportive constantly Express lazy getting job fair honesty didnt make feel good time got environment got two toxic couldnt go back school grades low spring semester lost scholarships couldnt go back university 2021 told would moving back school instead moved away grandparents took bus different city stayed homeless shelter Eventually dad found wanted move hesited first didnt know dad well took 13 years get milk knowing option went Gave year save enough money get apartment time told found apartment really didnt would spend paycheck within weekend ordering DoorDash Uber Eats Dad eventually found told grandparents also disappointed let stay residence another year stricter rules Rules honestly didnt like made feel like child one day dad went missing Stop showing work stopped coming home one knew phone cut bosses couldnt find one living apartment pays rent bills knew couldnt stay long found room stay house course grandparents worried also kind blamed disappearance started blaming stuff unrelated disappearance fair point Im compulsive liar maybe deserved ended cutting extended family told Ive done nothing life ever since graduated high school Ive wasted 4 years life accomplishing nothing set bad points ended contact year 2024 point started applying jobs job sucked found job even orientation set everything messed couldnt find ID needed ID I9 documents instead showing new job explaining situation ended going completely wasting new opportunity given time also put two weeks first day new job day last day old job Eventually ran money move room staying leaving homeless 5 months first kind accepted life thats would never go anywhere silly old decided get help got accepted rapid rehousing program cool could finally make progress life work towards getting tech field Fast forward barely made progress anything Work hard find consistently waking denied job applications making money became tiring Also experiencing mental health issues Ive come accept part Normally would soak mope bleak situation Im recently started realize kind coming Ive lied people multiple times emotionally hurt people push people away suicidal ideation Im also lazy theres opportunities could taken didnt Also Im trying get field becoming oversaturated without even college degree Lately Ive thinking Im fucked maybe thats better Ive noticed life cant keep blaming things events Yes moms passing tragedy everything kind fault one flunked university getting full ride scholarships one lied family one stayed shitty dead end job shit hated one got homeless record Ive homeless multiple times point one isnt getting employed keeps backing opportunities employment Ive come realize Im problem cant seem hardwire brain fixing problems need Honestly part fine dont think meant successful first place Success isnt even possible anymore totally fault accept fault pushed away friends family Im alone dont anyone really trust anymore Therapy doesnt work Making friendships doesnt work dont feel comfortable anyone anymore kind coming situation result mistakes past worst part two ways fix fix either going plans become successful eventually functioning member society go suicidal ideation thats head years Im lazy former much coward latter Im left third option stop crying accept part doesnt even want successful anymore feel like things didnt stress well homeless youre rock bottom nothing lose hard really feel stressed feeling know place makes sense Also extreme anxiety major depressive disorder dont think world meant people like anyway hate saying loud sounds like excuse gets disorders severely impacting point deabilitation start questioning things survive world like cant Everything overwhelming Everything much handle feel like someone like isnt meant functioning member society Ill leash day die unfortunate reality something need embrace accept

content: anyone else suffer dysfunctional family centers around money working alot forced toxic positivey stuff everyday improve life doesnt understand autism made attempts see struggles causes Especially burnout exacerbating ocd flares know surface good thing practice becomes draining depressing Dad used drink smoke alot never drinking smoking may casual beer hard day work one spends free time watching self improvement videos people like Jocko Willinks Tony Robbins James Clear Atomic Habits Holding say true due hearing successful people made alot money Believes self discipline happiness mind type mindsets told today get comfort zone push Im even trying pushed alot trying get degree computer science working full time retail summer breaks anger mental torment got pushing wore Plus streak bad luck prof teachers constantly stressed passing 247 Ontop lazy roommates passive aggressive touched stuff gone knew said something bug felt like would tension enough Chronically anxious made depress caused severe burnout felt drained dragging feet trying finish classes mad pissed unfair circumstances work moment made impact moved back Dad severe workaholic Disappointed lack effort even get bed reasonable time wake sad feel like never understands Im pessimistic live Canada economy shambles buying house seems like pie sky sort deal want goals OCD depression make day drain wake stuff immediately feel like sleeping psychiatrist dont understand ocd hope pills work Im 100 mg zoloft 50mg regular seroquel day 100mg seroquel xr night 1mg klonopin daily try help Dad always moves mean hurts yells keeps going even dont like bringing stuff goes stuff Good bad talks ear dont says give reasons sees excuse yells Even saying hes talking nicely condensing judge make feel guilty tonight asked could quickly brush teeth told fuck using time hour free time going bed cant waste five minutes let brush teeth get tires watching show yells makes feel bad doesnt even stay whole time watching show thats annoying try love working attitude insane goes bed 12am wakes uo around 4am either go work hour drive hour drive back hes paperwork complains hates life 80 percent bullshit 20 percent fun makes even pessimistic feel tired listening Even topics goes talking doesnt know shut mom better miss day retail job due ocd flare tells suck go work Shes whole new worms done part ruin development Anyways thats rant anyone similar parents done terms burnout ocd take supplements Like Ashwagandha Ltheanine gaba magnesium bisglycinate 5 read bit atomic habits daily stoic 366 title: Feeling hopeless angry
content: Ive anxiety long remember grew culture people werent aware mental disorders nobody noticed anything adult realized people arent anxious time remember watching people live lives like normal wondering cope horrible anxiety Im failure cant went see psychiatrist first one said didnt anxiety didnt look like second claimed cant possibly disorder Ive since childhood latter still gave low dose escitalopram buspirone worked fine mood relatively stable anxiety greatly reduced Years later came escitalopram able use hydroxyzine demand unable cope severe stressors realized two things 1 constant absolutely unending fatigue wasnt meds 2 need meds cant function without tried zoloft worked super low dose intolerable side effects also ADHD diagnosed GAD meantime Im currently trying atomoxetine weeks dont think anything psychiatrist said SSRIs option right side effects give feel like options disappearing nothing help tried therapy CBT MCT useless feel like trivializes anxiety really think 30 years anxiety wouldnt already started postponing worry capable actually believe need told analyze worries see unlikely happen Im already constantly analyzing fully aware unlikely knowledge doesnt help start meditating itll go away tried meditation tried grounding techniques tried mindfulness techniques tried listing thoughts naming tried sleeping enough tried eating healthy NONE WORKS psychiatrist hoping reducing ADHD symptoms reduce anxiety without SSRIs anxiety baseline nothing worry stable job stable relationship loving family nice apartment access public healthcare good insurance access private healthcare life objectively good probably goal many yet feel like Im chased apex predator 90 waking moments like come crashing Im moments away disaster fills much anger point read article psychiatrist people anxiety disorder really try therapy first fails maybe try SSRIs Well people like suggest go die body responding way supposed feel like therapy never going work Ive tried nothing meds failing either go back exhausted cant enjoy life mention side effects stay meds still cant enjoy life energy anxiety depressing Im sorry rant point Im angry world people keep preaching therapy keep pretending anxiety isnt actual debilitating disease dont know talk would actually understand frustration

title: Got cured Generalized Anxiety Disorder Heres worked
content: Hey guys avid follower sub long time place constant source panic attack relievers last months last session therapist told GAD cured 6 months literal hell dedication want share worked Background fellow GAD sufferers suffering constant worries usual panic attacks last years decided take action didnt know GAD back fullblown attack lasted hours hours early May year Started treatment late May one panic attacks contemplating committing suicide thank god courage stick routine Symptoms Luckily never physical symptoms diarrohea mouth ulcers common cortisol developed Amygdala Aftermath waking everyday buoyant mood life including social life dating life academic performance improved lets finally begin 1 Therapy Cant emphasize CBT therapists identify problematic impractical thought patterns associted Anxiety especially Cortexbased suggest ways cope via ABCDE RRR techniques work people medical experts need spend 23 months therapist deciding discontinuemove different Therapist Selftherapy books help always better someone form close friend therapist assist journey 2 Reading Books Rewire Anxious Brain Mindfulness Acceptance Workbook Anxiety Age Anxiety top 3 books recommend Finally Id suggest reading posts sub Caution chances feeling uneasiness panic attacks reading content make sure tell brain medicine beforehand 3 Meditation atleast 23 times day 125 mins everyday one day last 6 months missed wonderful thingBuddhist style meditation worked Mantra meditation guided meditation alternatives wide variety resources available online could possible dont see effects initial weeks Id suggest keep blindly 4 Gym 6 days week nonstop last 6 months except weeks travelling scientifically proven physical activity 20 mins almost everyday improves mental health Technically exercises helps body release endorphins rearrange synapse neurons done 10 weeks see significant results massive improving thought patterns 5 open open anxiety closed ones enable learn new strategies perspectives many things importantly shoulders fall upon fullblown panic attack Others practicing gratitude daily practicing hobbies soccer x200B Let know questions

title: Im 32 Broken Dont Know Fix Life Please Help
content: Part 1 Slow Unraveling dont remember started Maybe first time sat desk 2 debugging garbage legacy code realizing hadnt spoken another human 48 hours maybe moment looked bank account saw numbernot salary total debtand felt stomach drop like stone Ive programmer almost decade great one passionate onejust functional kind guy gets work done never stands kind guy survives layoffs never gets promoted kind guy watches peers move move burn spectacularly exist 32 Im standing wreckage life wondering hell got Part 2 Job Isnt Career work midtier tech company FAANG startupjust corporate entity pays enough keep trapped enough escape Every day Wake 830 already exhausted Scroll Slack messages half passiveaggressive reminders deadlines Try focus brain screams unpaid bills aging parents fact havent real vacation years End day vague sense dread knowing didnt learn anything new didnt grow existed another 8 hours used dream building something meaningful pray code doesnt break prod dont explain postmortem Part 3 Debt Thats Eating Alive owe much money Student loans 18yearold thought CS degree golden ticket Credit cards 25yearold depressed tried buy happiness Medical bills Personal loans point started borrowing keep Every month watch paycheck dissolve even hits account Minimum payments Interest Late fees treadmill Im running fast belt keeps speeding Ive thought bankruptcy Ive thought disappearing dont even energy either Part 4 Isolation live alone friends married moved away gone family thinks Im great work tech must making good money dont date dont go social skills atrophied point even ordering food phone gives anxiety real human interaction barista even rehearse order head three times speaking tried therapy Couldnt afford third session Part 5 Fear Future Im young anymore tech industry worships youth Im already feeling obsolete happens Im 40 still midlevel dev happens get laid cant find another job happens health fails havent seen doctor years happens wake one day 50 realize wasted entire life dont answers fear Part 6 Small Dark Thoughts wont lieIve moments wondered would easier exist dramatic way quiet exit debt deadlines pretending Im okay Im still somewhere deep theres tiny stubborn voice says Maybe doesnt like Ask Come Back dont know Im looking Maybe someone whos found way dug debt escaped burnout change rebuilt life feeling like failure start Im tired stuck dont want miraclejust path Thanks reading far

title: Im afraid brain broken
content: 44M Spent 20 years Lexapro suffered panic attack early 20s went 8 months feeling depersonalized disconnected 247 every medical test sun done head finally noticed pattern felt crowds tended feel worse hint needed Saw psychiatrist got put Lexapro issue resolved felt great years Lexapro living wild life 20something bachelor city wondered needed drug anymore attempted wean experienced horrible withdrawals prepared Back went cycle continued 20 years Fast forwarding 2022 older wiser fully knew wean expect weaned Lexapro course several months made 7 months medication free well wasnt traveled Canada US vacation stuck 3 hours line border annoyance big deal Made stressed ok family got stuck hotel elevator 2 hours panic attack lasted minutes beginning came back focused helping one kids tears way back US saw loooong line reentry thrown another panic attack next day flying Las Vegas experienced worst turbulence ever felt Things flying plane Another panic attack returned home noticed started feeling weird eating started getting anxiety regularly Back Lexapro went Something different time though difficult start remember previous times took six months able sleep well also random panic attacks would wake middle night Perhaps didnt remember bad things beginning case Lexapro year weaned Like going going far difficult remember made July 2024 made acute withdrawal phase early November still occasional anxiety nothing serious sought functional medicine doctor thinking could find root cause anxiety help last little bit put several supplements Nothing crazy multivitamin lot B vitamins vitamin magnesium fish oil two products called RelaxMax Immunitone wreck made everything worse tried wean slowly eventually stopped sleeping started anxiety day quit supplements sleep issues continued would sleep two hours wake every one hour rest night havent solid nights sleep since December 27th 2024 Insomnia fed anxiety anxiety fed insomnia vicious cycle began became desperate title: Uber driver panic attack midride Heres happened
content: early afternoon summoned Uber driver home take friends house watch basketball 2530 minutes away arrives greetings fine asked day standard stuff much talking us honestly dont mind Car clean well x200B 20 minutes drive notice hes sort glancing rearview like wants say something starts kind breathing deep breaths says Sorry pull reply Ok everything alright says Sorry panic attack remained calm told Ok thats fine man panic attacks Im going anywhere important take time Luckily able pullover residential area hill next us side walk wasnt really speaking much point told know attacks like alone dont worry Im hurry Ill curb playing games phone take time let know want call anyone x200B 2030 minutes later told could drive rest way could finish trip make money said give minutes able calm enough drive us arrived fine tipped told number needs talk someone anxiety well went ways think fresh air giving space helped instead worrying finishing trip Anyways small story today Cheers

title: 22M Struggling Burnout Derealization Weird Symptoms Even Possible Age
content: Hey everyone wanted share story see anyone gone something similar Im 22yearold guy past years Ive grinding hard three years ago started companies working 800 800 PM almost every day since Ive always thought taking good care myselfworking sleeping well eating clean BuildUp Around 2 years ago started feeling like work wasnt fun anymore business partner began pushing hardcalling every time messed something upand really started take toll Fast forward August 2023 packed life two bags traveled around Europe month time started sleeping less drinking though kept workouts trip planned go Cape Town airport two glasses wine suddenly felt extremely dizzy waiting gate couldnt breathe think firstever panic attack terrifying passed couple hours plane Things Went Downhill arrived felt okay day next morning coffee boomderealization hit like truck felt completely disconnected hasnt gone away since stayed bed three days panicking flying home Since Ive dealing symptoms Headaches Mostly neck front head come go DerealizationDepersonalization Constant 247 Fatigue feel drained time Tinnitus started two months ago Sleep sleep one extra hour per night still feel tired motivation work used love working cant find drive Weak hands grip feels weak times fine work Blurrybusy vision happens occasionally Health anxiety Constantly worrying whats wrong always guy found Cure things Im tired workout sleep better eat better food stressed went forest wanted someone love found girl months Ive always found solution everything even tho havent good always Current Lifestyle Right Im trying maintain balanced lifestyle support recovery work 45 times week eat clean foods including fruits also taking supplements like creatine zinc magnesium sleep body naturally wakes work around 68 hours day However dont hang friends much know isnt great mental health girlfriend whos supportive Living Sweden dark cold time year havent spending much time outside might also play role Im feeling Extra Context past asthma medication anymore unless truly need Im Wondering need resolve issues like testicle problems asthma concerns fully recover Im going even possible burn 22 anyone else experienced derealization similar symptoms stress helped recover stop booking appointments go life think Im want figure whats wrong insights experiences tips recovery would mean world Thanks advance

nicotine took iq test online look Im aware people say arent accurate Plus drug use young ageBut didnt expect get exactly 82 iq Maybe atleast average triggered anxiety even meds dont money actually retake professional test cant stop ruminating always suffered poor self esteem massive inferiority complex dash dependence reliance people little trust judgement begin completely gone cant handle uncertainty like every opinion word mouth justwrong Every perspective consideration reasoning come feels like poorly defined feel like theres knowing Im behind understanding Ive always helper love title: Intense Brainstorming Feels Like Cocaine Without High
content: Hey everyone Ive recently encountered weird phenomenon second time happened business often brainstorming meetings discuss interesting stuff really gets thinking Tons ideas thrown around super positiveI really love meetings usually last three hours heres thing meetings feel like Im cocainebut without euphoria big chunk anxiety think brain like body exercising start running sitting five hours body isnt ready need warm first even stop running heart rate temperature dont instantly go back normalit takes time cool feel like thats whats happening brain starts accelerating warming really hard stop took like three four even five hours meeting calm understand whats happeningits like different state consciousness Im aware try breathe relax mindful cant handle cant focus many thoughts running head causes anxiety pop makes feel really restless Im wondering anyone ever encountered something like new second time happened usually anxiety attacks caused smoking much weed led think death panic attacks worked psychologist kind beat Sometimes eat bad food triggers anxiety fear death thats different mild thing Im describing new weird Ill admit use cocaine year ago period two three monthsnot frequently maybe every couple weeksand havent used since Im wondering might effect feels like pain cocaine without euphoriaits feeling anyone experienced anything like insights would appreciated

title: quitting cocaine developed anxiety
content: Hey Im 28 used confident outgoing dont know related post context got addicted cocaine heavy user 3 years quit 2019 havent relapsed since past years since Covid quitting coke changed quite lot feel like Ive completely regressed person always look forward spending time friends comes day seeing get nervous keep overthinking theyll think Sometimes sweat Sometimes try cancel get nervous making basic conversation people dont know talk stutter voice breaks used able chat anyone would happily make friends random people hit girls Also physical things make feel extremely self conscious make extremely uncomfortable dont know would considered anxiety One gonna sound grossweird apologies get worried sh1t people smell something developed towards end coke addiction high would get extremely paranoid messing pants would spend hours toilet wiping repeatedly hundreds times check paranoia addiction seeing people watching dark towards end addiction every time got high dark outside curtains open would see faces window watching arent aware common paranoia coke addicts still feel uncomfortable dark windows dont hallucinate get uncomfortable enough sweat cant focus third physical sensation get sitting next someone nothing us Eg sofa get uncomfortable cant really explain really stresses get nervous cant focus Idk related first one Sorrry wall text sound like anxiety dont know things related caused getting worse last 4 years coincides quit drugs thought social anxiety something develop teenager dont understand still get coke paranoias clean nearly 5 years would like try get top issues feel really affecting life Thank reading appreciate advice
