title: Edible THC overdose
content: worst night life regular weed smoker 18 years regularly take edibles bongs dabs etc would consider high tolerance Fast forward last night Bangkok partner trying local smoking scene 2 weeks Thailand final night partying drinking probably dehydrating quite bit smoking throughout trip decided buy gummies help knock us flight back London MISTAKE gummies came packs 2 100mg us wanting take customs decided eat pack would like clarify partner isnt heavy drinker slightest whereas Im holiday enjoy beers daily go party often mean rum tequila etc however strong tolerance weed gummies labelled fast acting tasted awful chemically could feel almost numbing mouths chewed Within 30 minutes could feel something felt terribly wrong sudden hot flash excuse restaurant go splash water face try calm 10 minutes returned restaurant told partner wasnt sure could deal upcoming 12 hour flight starting feel little bit paranoid even minute later feel heart start absolutely pounding chest visibly shaking shirt started full panic couldnt catch breath starting feel like losing mind need reinforce bad actually felt like presume stroke would feel like shooting pains arms thoughts became totally delirious fully disassociated able comprehend even began severe heart palpitations made legs go completely numb held partner literally pushing wall went pharmacy airport ask help checked blood pressure heart rate 195bpm prompted call team medics instantly put IV drip began taking ECG readings followed swiftly putting stretcher taking hospital explain feeling fully convinced going end life felt going completely insane mind wondering caused severe reaction regularly taken edibles similar higher MG levels THC never anything even remotely close guessing due drink system dehydration damn brutal experience scared edibles good also wondering whether mg count much higher packet suggested Thanks reading careful youre edibles

title: Beware SSRI withdrawal
content: Sharing case helps anyone else couple months ago weaned Prozac 7 years help GP psychiatrist within couple weeks finishing started terrible symptoms including Nocturnal panic attacks Sleep paralysis hadnt years irritability sense doom emotional everything brain zaps feeling like going crazy didnt think could withdrawal Prozac couple weeks since thought could Generalized Anxiety flaring Ive feeling hopeless finally went psychiatrist told likely Prozac withdrawal turns withdrawal last long six months didnt wean medication long enough whole time thought symptoms GAD back normal normal bad probably usual anxiety likely withdrawal given severe friendly reminder always consult psychiatrist weaning SSRIs remember withdrawal take

title: Hydroxyzine withdrawal
content: Anytime miss day hydroxyzine feel fine go two days like vomit feel panicky forced take pills know hydroxyzine treats nausea Im wondering like kind rebound taking Anyone else similar experiences UPDATE keeps getting new comments even 3 years later wanted tell yall eventually came course several weeks weaned meds didnt need anymore Let clear still anxiety got point manage without meds change lot lifestyle adopt healthy habits healthy diet daily exercise cutting back weed vaping getting good grades get anxiety good place originally taking 2 25mg 50mg total pills daily usually bed began weaning taking 15 pills 1 pill 5 25 longer prescribed truly truly need emergency anxiety fix avoid believe anxiety part life shouldnt numb without attacking root cause take benadryl works well Good luck everyone UPDATE 2 cant believe comments still getting 4 years later going continue keep thread open continue respond folks anyone prescribed wont say dont take take daily let become habitual anyone stuck medication lots others success weaning course weeks know tough anxiety hang DMs always open questions

title: Lexapro withdrawal
content: Hi Im 18f Ive recently undergone many changes medication due panic disorder returning caught COVID19 switch Lexapro Brintellix hell earth clarification Ive taken Lexapro since 11 means little 8 years brain addicted consuming nonstop never considered taking break since suffer major depressive disorder doctor told go cold turkey since dose wasnt high Looking back BAD idea worst case brain zaps Whenever walked moved eyes brain would zap left side body occasionally nauseous dizzy cold sweats daily occurrence Thought stroke something 14 days finally got rid brain zaps left side body still aches muscles twitch idea muscle achesstiffness related withdrawal pretty worried since severe health anxiety Google hasnt helpful slightest Also thought would fine brain zaps went away huge indicator Lexapro withdrawal doesnt make sense slightest like body fighting

title: fix anxiety attacks killing
content: bad breakup around 4 months ago Loved girl got ring told family one Planned propose get fulltime job freelancing right university toxic ex came relationship pretty soon told somehow scared might say didnt want us together anymore going back ex said mind every time assured nothing like happening blamed mind playing tricks said dont believe ok always side long takes prove blamed thinking like started distancing reason couldnt understand emotions got better sad time met girl classes talked 34 days like hi whats u fine like girlfriend said dont trust anymore incident couldnt fathom tried keeping happy loved much centerpiece world revolved 34 weeks worst day life pretty much everything family careerwise went shit asked night came 2 hours late asked wrong go like said misses ex much gets happy sees April see every day happy lively everything happy weird feeling going head dont know get try forget comes rushing back hate knees saying marry replying yes want fix get life happy hands feel empty days without holding hands eyes still look corridors classrooms want done move things Im meant sobbing mess im right Help please advice something please

title: Everyone told severe anxiety wrong
content: past 50 days going Every day Ive felt like cant breathe like Im heart attack Normally body breathes subconsciously dont even think would get episodes felt think every breathe honestly felt like dying told panic attacks stressed didnt feel stressed heart rate never went episodes started pick pattern seemed always happen 2 hours eatingbut sometimes would eat little would still happen went fully anxiety rabbit hole anxiety medicine seeking therapy everything none helped Well fast forward today Ive realized Im allergic gluten cut gluten totally fixed issue frustrating many doctors family friends tell axiety issue much health issue wish luck finding works hopefully helps someone strong advocate confident think may actual issue

title: Something er doc said helped
content: Possible trigger warningsome tough love got er anxiety related symptoms kinds bloodwork everything looks good Basically wrapping asked true reason came today replied make sure isnt anything wrong replied something wrong said meant something physically wrong wasnt dying said dying something physically wrong anxiety isnt mental disorder physical Youre dying way live life bit harsh seemed type tells like help made realize hes right isnt way live worrying dying illnesses isnt living hope help someone

title: wish could take Klonopin every day
content: coming place addiction alarms dont need go lol Im good taking needed dont feel withdrawal heightened panic Im However take feels like perfect match brain medication comes close less feeling high versus feeling like absolutely cant stand stigma benzos factual reasons weary course think people really jump quickly bit mixed rant would love hear community helped daily level regard yes consulting psychiatrist shes hard reach appointment isnt Christmas Edit many opinions appreciate viewpoints truly said comment Id like say well isnt debate patients debate amongst professionals Truth told psychiatrists differing viewpoints usage benzos theyre necessary much necessary etc dont blanket answer although wish Mental illness equally complicated science complicated issue live hope everyone reading finds relief deserve works

title: Beat Anxiety Disorder Advice
content: youre reading currently midst anxiety disorder let start saying know feel Ive panic attacks adrenaline rushes dont stop Ive nauseated unable eat drink days end Ive felt short breath like drowning water jitters lump throat Ive also uncomfortable mental symptoms Ive dissociated almost full day multiple times Ive racing intrusive thoughts lasted weeks sometimes months time Ive felt like going crazy lot Im tell struggle anxiety disorder almost year conscious concerted effort worst symptoms anxiety completely gone mild ones still appear time time Ill get fatigued dizzyfoggy maybe every weeks happens infrequently becomes less frequent occurrence doesnt really bug also medication SSRI since day one benzo first months process tapering wanted write post get stage anxiety mainly know really would appreciated kind guidance first sought help late April last year want summary things regardless stage youre scroll bottom check paragraph bold dont discuss responses specific symptoms back Sometimes itll even two steps forward two steps back even times okay serve proof capable improving know start give effort things start gradually getting better comprehensive guide recovering work 1 Stop trying fight anxiety symptoms Understand best thing body right let run course basis Acceptance Commitment Therapy ACT one types therapy currently used treat anxiety disorders Dont try stop anxiety easily fueled focus whatever move attention something else MUCH easier said done mind fight every stage integral part recovery first started found short activities helpful like picking guitarcajon playing song two homework 3 Give time system cant sustain anxiety levels high extended period time unless consciously fuel properly easing symptoms engaging activities youll eventually calm next phase anxiety recovery 4 recommended physician benzo might help Benzos basically nervous system relaxants theyre magic pill took first dose valium didnt feel thing took days constant dosing see effect Benzos fine use beginning issue warning try use sparingly possible Benzos meant used long term first thing feeling anxious reach benzo youll real difficulty recovering later stages since title: Open Letter Anyone Struggling Anxiety
content: time life anxiety ruled everything didnt realize first thought overthinking cautious wasnt waking racing heart reason avoiding calls messages scared saying wrong thing replaying conversations head trying figure messed lying bed night physically exhausted wide awake mind wouldnt let rest One moment stands simple outing friends surface smiling laughing part group inside felt like battlefieldheart pounding stomach churning mind constantly scanning room imaginary threats one around knew good hiding good Thats thing anxietyits invisible everyone else look fine act fine even convince youre fine deep youre carrying weight one sees remember breaking point realized couldnt keep alone sitting car drained even start engine felt like stuck also knew didnt want live way anymore moment didnt fix everything first time acknowledged feeling wasnt life anxiety okay admit Ive learned since anxiety doesnt mean youre broken doesnt mean youre weak means feel deeply care deeply sometimes mind gets overwhelmed thats okay youre reading feels familiar please know youre alone dont figured Start small Talk someone trust Take deep breaths Remind youve made every anxious moment one youll make one Anxiety may always part doesnt define doesnt define either stronger think even days feels like barely holding Take one moment time Youve got

title: Reminder Anxiety suffering simulation
content: suffering real youre suffering simulation real imaginary lies part mind made cant actual danger Actual dangers come outside Fear meant protect danger fear overworks causes life become living hell loses whole point existence Fear isnt meant make suffer endlessly meant spur act defense short keep looping fear cycle fear defeated purpose stop functioning reasonable amount light fear called Eustress justified keeps toes hostile environment Anything fear anything paralyses hinders full functioning prevents thinking straight prevents working according plan excess fear definition defeated purpose fear point existing higher number times affirm Im actually safe except XYZ faster feel better Remember unless youre actually active war zone shooting youre quite safe Say Im actually quite safe except XYZ Finally remember Hot flashes crawling ants crampy pain tingling needles sensations discomfort danger Discomfort uncomfortable safe Edit Jesus Christ blew Thank much awards Replying take time Yall know goes excited scared happy sad full range hour

title: anyone ever feel like extremely lonely also one isolating Ex going outside house days also declining offers go
content: Hi Ive struggled since young teen grew suburbs immigrant parents one older sibling always huge groups friends gfs never home parents never ever went socializing felt like burden didnt many friends couldnt spend much money holidays another day home never anything special wasnt last decade kids grown theyre retired started traveling world taking hobbies making friends kid complained feeling cooped home couldnt relate anxiety always felt like close friends always groups friends huge families never weekend day theyd home moping always groups friends besides core friend group random occasions every person occupied always hit extremely lonely feel adult still hits Everyone knows Im extreme introvert love home lately Ill home 34 days straight cant bring leave 1000sq ft apt live alone get mail take trash drive run errands simple socialization day bunch things could outside errandwise home chorewise ex decluttering closets getting freelance projects done job hunting etc instead cant bring fixate loneliness let dishes pile eat junk foodinstant ramen waste hours YouTube internet sit around crying reason people text hang decline dont understand whats going like Ive reached level slob cant bring get ready 20 min go outside hang family even ask dinner something thought coordinate 3 different parties choose restaurant think 5 hours productivity wont get back though lets real wont anything productive gives extreme anxiety Im torn wanting bask solitude miserable lonely anyone relate issue specific since childhood lazy POS thats problem

title: switch anxiety meds life unbearable without
content: ive Zoloft 100mg 68 months treat social anxiety first started effects started kick abt month 4 worked well however longer stay feels like success decreasing doctor told could try another medication tapered one life unbearable told put back told try 125mg see increase effects doesnt seem working dont think handle another 24 months social anxiety wait new meds kick zoloft isnt effective anymore feel symptoms coming back premedication im getting immune advice

title: Youre broken Anxiety lies
content: Anxiety makes feel like something wrong like youre stuck feeling way forever thats true Youre broken youre dealing brain thats trying hard protect racing thoughts physical symptoms constant fear feels unbearable sometimes pass wont feel like forever might take time anxiety isnt life sentence Youre going okay Take one step time dont figured breathe keep going Youre stronger think need vent Im Youre alone

title: Life anxiety becoming unbearable
content: Hi everybody past years definitely hardest Ever since turned 20 24 confronted situations made anxiety spiral try challenge life trying new things actually end giving beause puts terrible strain example wanting volontary work abroad university studies trying new workplace tried pet twice due terrible anxious reactions give back days anxiety manifests terrible stomach pain makes vomit prevents sleeping days end continues panic attacks diarrhea weight loss Everytime start challenge cancel experience order lessen anxiety time miss many opportunities desperately want achieve pain really becoming unbearable feel like putting big strain family Especially due recent event adopting kitten able take care overthinking turning incredibly sick aware act terrible put family unnecessary pain feel like monster huge burden others really getting worse time goes psychotherapy visited psychiatrists prescribed xanax feeling like failure really need guidance handle

title: Life unbearable partner friends especially youre physically sick top depressed
content: month ago experienced first seizure Ive ever tonic clonic next terrifying thing ever happen life couldnt turn anyone sort comfortsupport Im alone couple days ended catching Covid first time despite badly ravaged already weakened mindbody still couldnt turn anyone sort comfortsupport Im alone week awful things happened birthday also took place nobody noticed cared Im alone weeks afterwards suffered terribly long Covid additional seizures focal variety throughout could lay arms wrapped around body whispering whatever little comfort could give like man freezing dark clinging tattered blanket warmth past used couple people spoke online depression assortment mental illnesses suffer made isolate completely Ive never IRL friends everything thats happened past month feel like Im scrambling try reach people Im glad say Ive met couple nice individuals way talk much day sit completely alone room lonely scared like Ive never Whats worse though need people pushes away dont want buzzkill desperate clingy needy really hard youre crisis yet regardless doesnt make less repellent normal person unburdened chronic depression couldve least good friends loving partner help whole ordeal instead Ive largely go alone Ive always depressed neurotic havent ability form sort connections people right worst trap life set since crisis hits especially medical variety one else see let tell isnt enough TLDR Depression destroys ability make meaningful connections others turn sets nightmarish future cope major emergencies completely

title: Job hunting anxiety disorder
content: honestly feel like one thing could perfectly trigger anxiety attacks tick boxes trigger panic attacks would job hunting Questioning overall selfworth Check Questioning skills Check Panicking long job descriptions words blur together said panic nothing makes sense brain stops functioning heart palpitates hands shake Check Feeling like overall failure dont qualify forget rejected job Check Becoming overstimulated hyperventilating sheer amount positions scroll Check expect 45 bulletpoints Im capable Im jack trades brain would explode daily basis cant Check Redoing resume 35 times never perfect enough Check able decide want life thus experiencing overwhelming desire give Check Catastrophizing situation turns full blown panic attacks weekly basis havent heard back jobs thus convinced Ill unemployed forever Check Job hunting soulsucking experience everyone involved time Im convinced one unbearable experiences people struggle GAD least seems Typing waking today find finally recovering two straight days panic attacks coupled fabulous depressive episodes thrown knocked completely commission week overworking job hunt spent two days crying shaking taking Ativan needed feeling like nothing ever okay Sigh Back EDIT Wow Came back post late day didnt realize much noticed Thank guys much kind words advice support sharing relatable stories wish things easier know struggle like hell heres everyone commented hopefully landing job love despite Thanks support making feel far less alone thoughtsstruggles Even though lot comments guys simply relating wrote helpful hear really wish nobody else feel waybut theres comfort knowing Im alone Youre amazing humans thanks awards

title: Permanent Anxiety Heres story went away
content: goal provide hope insight others experiencing anxiety sharing journey Maybe help one person seeking answers like isnt quick fix simply experience years maybe gather useful info post mainly people recently stumbled anxiety specifically drug related event may help anyone like call ongoing panic attack 2 years started senior year college never really anxiety would call would certainly get nervous anxious exams fears fairly minor would overthink stuff always bit hypochondriac would never claimed anxious person first panic attack lot stressors going life time 2021 Covid graduating college trying figure life dating isolation etc decided time isolation Covid would try edibles help tough times always bit goody two shoes never sort drugs would really drink occasionally point desperate first times lot fun time year decided take increased dosage felt though wasnt really much fun first time done Went taking usual 10mg deciding take 20mg started feel extremely anxious overwhelming sense dread fear whole body started freaking first panic attack playing video games time desperate go ER Felt like almost time loop lasted hours maybe least felt like cant remember Truly worst experience entire life next days still felt kinda bleh something past INCIDENT week goes Im laying bed phone sudden Im feeling little anxious Ive worked feeling end another panic attack time even scarier didnt know happening least knew weed something happens people panic however didnt go away nothing consciously thinking make feel way loop anxious anxious Days go panic doesnt subside whole body shaking Im alone apartment horrified end going ER ended giving fast acting anxiety medication finally found small bit peace debilitating anxiety gone 10 8 longer shaking still incredibly overwhelmed Eventually ended moving back home journey get back normal started anxiety wouldnt come go NONSTOP waking morning going bed night single moment peace always couldnt anything driving intense depression Usually worst morning due high cortisol time body sensitive increase DESPERATE CURE time looked kinds things fix looking symptoms finding stories Reddit Many things read often made feel worse people talking got high forever changed worried going develop schizophrenia start lose mind swept away mental hospital HOWEVER Ive learned sadly little late something MANY PEOPLE exactly think irrational thoughts incredibly common much research convinced something wrong body anxiety isnt due sort stress something wrong body find fix tried therapy improving gut health exercise meditation allergies journaling blood tests Xrays kinds health stuff afraid going life forever really wouldnt able take much longer Medication last resort MEDICATION finally put Buspirone 10mg weeks felt change DONT LET MAKE LOSE HOPE convinced even medication wouldnt able help adding medications increasing dosage finally stopped months trial ISNT saying medication fixes everything know time seen many posts people talking didnt work working show brighter side things time unemployed living home around time getting medication started fun job Escape Room place job loved people work everything truly needed tandem medication helped wake one morning realize hadnt felt anxious time almost 2 years constant unbearable fear found comfort finally ended even finding someone work gone something similar exact thoughts going develop schizophrenia go crazy enjoying life LIFE look back find frustrating searching fear Reddit someone lived gone made okay could find horror stories People saying like 15 years something like WORST THING HEAR trying find hope like hell guys someone needs thinking think difficult find good stories often times searching negative symptoms people post problems solutions scarce THINGS HELPED Exercise Running worst thing world hey really help even little bit Meditation Working trying ground feeling especially rough Sleepcasts Helped get sleep distract love Rainday Antiques Headspace Headspace Super awesome meditation stuff framing anxiety Theres app also lot free stuff YouTube Medication Dont give Environment Surround people support understand one else could even perceive going doesnt mean youre alone got fun job focused living present bit Therapy Even talking feel family friend find someone online similar CONCLUSION think panic something coming many stressors weed last straw still lot anxiety careers Id like life think thats probably stress graduated mostly subconscious Medication environment helped get point felt like didnt need anymore Hopefully post help one person lost searching help similar stories advice please share questions ask away EDIT Thank everyone sharing lot could write wanted say Im trying frame medication perfect solution helped get body state debilitating anxiety could work things giving anxiety time didnt think problem thought body ruined weed Also want say youre reading post years feel free still ask questions know rough stay strong

title: really anxiety 5 months doctors feel like Im dying
content: stressful period life 5 months ago wasnt definitely Ive went worse throughout life started constant head pressure dizziness went neurologist said vertigo Started medications vitamins symptoms kept getting worse far seen neurologist two cardiologists electrophysiologist internal medicine doctor gastroenterologist 5 months say least hell symptoms increasing getting worse 1 Dizzy lightheaded sometimes point think Ill faint pass 2 Short breath constantly feel like body isnt getting oxygen Sometimes feel like Im suddenly stop breathing body gets cold warm feel like brain isnt getting oxygen Especially back neck 3 Pain chest arms legs especially left leg Theres constant tightness feels like burnings stabbing nerve pain body pain sometimes 4 Tinnitus Constant ringing ears makes crazy 5 fatigue unbearable feel like cant anything 6 Disorientation feeling like Im control body 7 Head pressure sometimes accompanied headache sudden stabbing pains sides head 8 Visual disturbances slight double vision trails little dots 9 Worst palpitations sudden tachycardia episodes literally rest thinking anything trying fall asleep walking around house feel heart race itll go upto 130150 electrophysiologist says IST prescribed beta blocker temporarily calm racing heart however still feel heart beat 247 Pounding irregular heartbeat feels like Im heart attack Episodes slowly becoming frequent happen get super lightheaded breathe start sweating 11 Hot flashes body gets warm Sweating 12 Acid reflux needed vomit times 13 left leg constant pain especially ankles calves Recently seen swelling cant doctors check looking saying cause weight 14 Fluctuating BP sometimes low sometimes high Sometimes nowhere Ill get lightheaded pounding heart body get tingly pain arms legs tightness chest literally feels like body gets cold give episodes getting frequent day come nowhere Im travelling happyish matter distracted theyll come nowhere genuinely feel like Im dying symptoms mentioned come Ive checked iron vitamin deficiencies came back fine Vitamin low months back able raise supplements EKG Echo 24 hour Holter said IST stress test brain MRI theyve found nerve loop brain mild sinusitis went antibiotics slightly raised cholesterol doctor said itll get better control diet loose weight wanted get chest CT doctor said tests fine needed really dont know anymore Im trying many anxiety meds nothing working feel like bed ridden waiting death cant function cant go friends ruining marriage want know whats wrong Im constantly anxious something bad happen suddenly anxiety

content: last time self harmed year ago know even depressing near Christmas dealing anxiety self harm three bit years didnt ever think would get mental illness fact self harm evolved even worse weird think one thing happening life changed everything sudden well started locking away friends family school became hell hole alone idea going head never got treatment mum tried get woman help came house swear godshe useless appreciate fact mum wanted help apart didnt want help Id living monster long started feel like apart identity scared wasnt ill enough would wasting time wouldnt actually care greedy money Thinking understand crazy sounds think like could blame state dad started notice became infuriated difficult explain people havent gone made worse people stick around would pop phone constant wanted know help even didnt know exactly wrong someone help even dont know whats wrong completely lost touch real world Three years later still extremely difficult perseverebecause even though may think cant get better always used RAGE ever anyone told true honest dont think ever overcome mental health Ive incredibly better thoughtout three years Ive grown person Ive learnt new things experienced new happy memories Im actually going clean joyful Christmas present time life currently happiest Ive since best part Im thankful course days think wish wasnt around mental health taught much made stronger thankful SoTHANK ANXIETY THANK Remember love brain body get one life spend best way possibly Give breaks shitty day dont force anything take day pick back following day Dont let anyone tell arent ill enough get treatment mental health makes worthless much life pain suffering importantly Congratulate getting past even couple days weeks months might seem like much every extra day dont self harm beating believe Learn love brain 3 Merry Christmas guys x

title: Please stop medication shaming
content: PSA anxiety community bad enough get people dont even understand concept anxiety 10x worse comes people within community also suffer anxiety disorders Goddamn get left right fellow anxiety sufferers moment mention Im medication always turns preaching may think youre helping youre really many different preachy topics people get main sentiments oh youre strong enough weak leaning meds using would hard oh theyre really bad keep taking youre going end dementiacancer age 30 Fuck experienced something traumatic able handle without assistance meds Therapy alone cut Going walks outside whatever didnt help either people smugly like suggest much fear literally disassociated Meds kept hospitalized got shit doctor people sub specifically havent commented Youre going die horribly meds afraid scared feel ashamed Well guess found fantastic therapist completely understands plight one first sessions told meds saved life therapy alone wouldnt ever helped IMMEDIATELY agreed like oh yep definitely powerful reactionfeeling know experienced trauma past told stopped drinking antianxiety med panic disorder someone smugly told oh dropped one addiction another Oh boy shared anger really dont care hear anyones help advice comes choice take medications dont want shaming able overcome issues without medication good dont want hear bad healthwise Theres holierthanthou preachy mindset disguised sympathy fucking hate OOooOOoo theyre bad Guess whats also bad eating sleeping fulfilling basic biological needs survive due fear Hm Wonder worse would rather live shorter happier life due relief anxiety due meds live long tortuous life thats people say doctor brutal meds said essentially finally laid addiction doesnt happen everybody someone lecture medication going give full blown addiction told better simply got months sure didnt anything say bottom line stop shaming people choose medications want celebrate youre healthy untainted pharmaceuticals go somewhere else everyone lucky Yes Im bitter edit clear mostly comes fact take benzos apparently big nono many people Im sure would experience people taking nonbenzos People really love scare saved life continue shrug

title: anybody lived serotonin syndrome
content: think gave serotonin syndrome wont describe exactly gives idea 99 sure took gave serotonin syndrome around wednesday night didnt call ambulance fault decided early longest hellish night life would rather die live embarrassment taken hospital due one stupid moment imagined parents finding disappointment faces imagined work finding imagined new life worked hard create washed away couldnt let live world like wrote letter whomever case didnt make sat struggling breathe heart pumping chest Collapsing every time tried stand face red flushed mouth dry bone Hallucinating confused crying begging unknown entities Bargaining universe please dont let need go hospital cant cope embarrassment cant whatever reason made finally slept two nights Ive settled lot However vision still quite blurred still catch breath every muscles keep stiffening feel Im lying still keep needing constant hydration cant describe bad night still unsure survived keep switching relief didnt die let everyone panic Ive done serious damage generalised post traumatic stress incident Im wondering actually Ive done something cant cured without medical intervention Curious anybody experienced anything similar

since get symptoms smoking marijuana Pounding heart full blown psychosis level thc guaranteed panic attack Fast forward 18 years old please judgement free hard admit Im daily user meth since January panic attack giving arithmia weeks ago took infamously shitty hospital ambulance wait see cardiac event would occur kicked 12 hours later without letting speak doctor Hopefully meaning Im immediate risk cardiac event sometimes symptoms mind shattering havent seen doctor years besides trip ER using meth every single day since January Ive noticed something interesting panic attacks longer occur title: 21 memory problems making feel like lifes ended even began
content: preface Ive depression since far back freshmen year high school used worse cleared somewhat since year Im generally pretty happy rarely relapses really get head still struggle find motivation pursue goals mostly wasting time playing video games watching TV Ive also anxiety years manifests mainly health anxiety used worry usual things cancer heart problems lot physical ailments nowadays pretty much exclusively worry Alzheimers dementia form irreversible cognitive disease Originally used really pick apart small lapses memory things like mixing words could easily brush aside ignore telling everyone moments like last months feels really manifested thing Ive afraid find really flubbing words time mixing two words syllables swapping similar word rather one want Im also really concerned often completely blank words names used sharp eloquent school sometimes stop speaking midsentence simply think information need finish thought tried pay much mind Ive found unsure incorrectly recalling things feel never forget day couldnt think name kids show Sesame Street show watched much younger talked countless times could think characters show Elmo Oscar Big Bird etc took almost 30 seconds finally recall word Sesame Yesterday trying talk different types bottled water wanted say name Fiji name came mind instead Fuji knew wrong soon said wasnt looked real name clicked Today tried think many letters English alphabet number came mind fucking 27 knew didnt sound right counted fingers couldnt help break tears number 26 hell forgets many letters one mother tongue really gets yes mental illnesses like depression anxiety cause memory problems shortterm working memory stuff like trouble retaining new information forgetting day happens mainly actively distressed instances shortterm working memory problems Ive actively anxious depressed happen fundamental memory recall longterm memory getting worse worse making embarrassed even talk friends coworkers feel like day Im going wake find become little harder remember things one day gets bad someone confront Im 21 years old Im going brain 90 year old start career buy house start family doctor confirmed suspicions dont think could continue life hopeless dont know

title: fianc hiding medication
content: could use help navigating situation please 26f fianc 33m together total 4 years getting married August 25 year old son well diagnosed Bipolar Disorder Borderline Personality Disorder General Anxiety Disorder Post Traumatic Stress disorder obesity fianc diagnosed Aspergers syndrome family extensive history mental health disorders childhood traumatic Ive always issues got worse baby finally receiving extra care postpartum program received medications first time antipsychotic antidepressant took year half helped lot Things werent perfect much level headed capable facing lifes challenges Well around last fall fianc decided cant stand medication never loved idea really started hate gained 30lb antipsychotic certainly part concern Im 40lb heavier got together course many months would guilt every day drugged dependant encourage come medication believes Im manipulated big pharma prescribed something dont really need consulted psychiatrist didnt support coming meds helped anyway Ive meds month half GUYS going well mood swings incredible Im agressive mean violent insane manic episodes spent literally money financially dependant Im full time student doesnt work also miserable depressive episodes also 419 GPA school semester failing fianc believes proper sleep eat half maintenance calories exercise among healthy habits mental health issues would resolved Believe tell puts IMMENSE guilt pressure every day push things mom mom siblings friends therapists 2 family doctor believe need medicated says refuses marry someone drugs given ultimatum scary manic episode last week reached antipsychotic wrestled hands spilling floor picked hid bottle refuses tell Yes know red flags please remember Aspergers syndrome putting hell cries every day stress dealing mood swings believes get better without medication dont question navigate situation convince medication drug literal medicine ease symptoms real conditions convince intense symptoms withdrawal convince cruxes health ever important achieve cannot accomplished even worked struggling stay sane Thank

title: anybody lived serotonin syndrome

title: BPD dramatic
content: Im 17F Ive always struggled depression anxiety since little molested child father Later grade school bullied Life got harder harder older got couldnt keep friends whenever somewhat relationship would become obsessive needy constantly needing reassurance everything sophomore year lost friends got broken first serious boyfriend got toxic relationship 1 month later hated boyfriend time scared alone Later 2nd semester junior year broke soon dropped support system depressed roughly year since Ive discoveredresearched BPD strongly relate symptoms BPD like overly emotional black white thinking things dont relate dont things often Things like rage Ive seen people BPD get triggered something split rage Ive done much would considered rage splitting however seen different types splitting Like isolation splitting even one thats called euphoria Ive experienced Im scared Im lying reasonIm scared Im secretly someone wants perceived mentally ill people feel bad genuinely feel feel would lie Loneliness feels horrible feel like Im constantly walking slow motion water weighted blankets drooped entire Im comfortable sadness feel comforting safe Im alone one around Im alone dont get invited around family living room get hurt mad Like didnt invite Im wanna spend time together dont wanna alone want fun even care Im Im alone concern start think one cares bc always normalor didnt invite bc hate glad Im get mad wouldnt care family dont want around theyre giving space know get sad know struggle certain things Maybe wanted give time alone didnt want alone Idk Im self diagnosing obviouslyand spoken mom older sister sister studies psychology told mom thinks BPD diagnosis definitely something look right Idk help please feel like Im going crazy Im even adult yet

title: Chronic pain ruining life
content: 18 years old male problems pain effecting everyday life every task like life feel Im gonna living rest life would rather started around 2 years ago started getting mild random pains different body parts thought nothing alarming anyways fast forward year pain increased major amount along pain daily thing life still hope point time faith doctors would able fix issue Fast forward today life becoming hell Im extreme pain day wether Im activitys affecting college work even going quit unbearable work cant stand 30mins without knees completely giving Ive 10 appointments doctors seems Im getting nowhere havent done anything point right direction cured accepted able cure chronic pain hard diagnose Im really hopeless life gone shit cant see anything destroying friendships relationships parents Everyday last year Ill go work get day extreme pain makes work 10x worse go home legs feel like Ive ran marathon really passionate gym past year half thing really love helped confidence much pains feel like dream thing good thing find joy life getting taken away due body go gym without high level burning pain making start enjoy remeber issues Id train course would hurt muscles since Ive pain training increased 10x exaggeration Im getting point feel Im going end ending theres hope left live like much longer life anymore mentally destroyed problems Im 18 years old hope theres someone shed light situation

title: Depression loneliness freaking followed
content: Hi every1 would like speak simple terms alone different feeling different times Sometimes feels weird like crazy weird relatives remotely Nobody meet range hundred kilometers quite big city one seems truly relative Everyone stranger people maybe little bit still cautious like minesweeper cant relate deeply bc hurt moment live almost constant stress sometimes freaks get depressed try take good care eat fresh get enough move sleep well loneliness sometimes catches core chokes damage Time passes get calm think waits get weak point fucking insane go quite well time get caught bad mood almost nowhere Makes want suspend living see point alive conscious everyday roses sweets fuck sake feeling gets heavy think happens often dont want strangers help dont want anybody invading life even think inviting anyone social activity idea seems unbearable feel plain uncomfortable saying inventing terms feel almost retarded certainly cringe Like fit anywhere likeability 0 dont drink dont smoke value good health gets nowhere anyway point take drink smoke feel relief feel bad afterwards sick really try spend wise dont waste food spend time active thinking getting degree Still see future Im getting mad dont dog cat rent little room dont want mice fish bc interactive believe another human Im freaking rn outdoor gym felt overwhelmed started warm took headphones came many people exercise well dont know quite calm apart kids came like twenty thirty people could bear exercising little quiet exercise much made freak last thing believe strangers anything bc believing straight way deceived Even people talk saying nice look good dont believe one second later say something totally different dont believe any1 would care spend time attention read shit apart people follows moves dont talk shit spend think wasted bc nothing helps apart something dont really exists right hope find better things benefit

title: health struggles mean
content: know long rambling points need put need advice kneeleg hurts badly every day days barely walk cant stand extended period time back hurts every day bad knee get different pains everywhere randomly also feel different legback pain pain knee started 3 months ago Ive RELIEF doctors visits feel sick frequently Almost flulike feel like fevers whole body achingi feel bedridden exhausted sometimes even make meal shower sometimes normal every day tasks like walking around grocery store simply walking around house minute 2 feels like ran marathon Im constantly anxious Im afraid go anywhere anything fear shamed judged feel awkward every social interaction dont know communicate effectively fail miserably kind social gathering Writing preferred way communication gives time need verbal communication get panicky dont know say moment fumble words mumble sometimes people cant even understand words Im saying repeat anxious feelings erupt feel like Im strange go straight always wanting run awaydisappear constantly thought spiral cant concentrate anything except happened Im perceived creates pure panic cant enjoy anything Im constantly worrying something happened past whether 10 seconds ago yesterday years ago Im worried past Im worried future makes enjoyment nearly impossible cant concentrate movies stories etc Thinking much time never stops found gaming helps extent even dont find experiencing joy distracting constant pain thats serves distraction mental physical emotional pain feels like constantly pushed hell feelings abnormally intense misery pain unbearable every single time experience consider taking life end pain Imagine set fire unable anything get consumed pain burn imagine happening life happens gasp cry often times lock wanting scream lungs want shout help want release hurts terribly bad willing try anything stop Help like walls caving medicine strong enough Im crawling skin Sometimes feel like giving cant isnt blood thats impulsivity comes want anything make us feel better anything put fire case almost always quitting Quitting job activities cutting ties friends lover want disappear illogical know illogical tell person fire use logic worst thing anything trivial trigger always feel bad shouldnt feeling trivial matter acting dramatic like world ending theres control call shit storms see approaching huge Probably caused nothing destroy everyone around stop storms see coming theres nothing stop draining Im tired Im always tired Even lot sleep still feel tired frequently dreams Sometimes good mostly bad frequently consist tortured dying able save someone sometimes dreams involving death child like shes talking telling shes sad sad shes disappointed Im sick battling brain time cant face world struggles Im constantly weakened always wonder people live till 80 dont want live long fact days wake hoping last day Im 30s yet feels like lived century already Ive considered suicide miserable moment end wreck keep going facing storm dont see way Therapy meds water symptoms never kill Im injured point cant even take small cut anymore yet crazy thing Im happy also intense everyone including hard time believing Im sick Im jumpy giggly love life people want spread joy make people laugh say funny things feels like Im flying Ive gone around circles long fooled temporary ecstasy thrown hell long brain goes numb adapt happens feel like dont exist Like everything happening around TV show Im watching screen Like voices sounds around happening barrier Im alive even Im feeling anything point Im drifting life Ill keep taking meds going doctors waiting end want live want enjoy life want healthy shows Im fighting hated life wouldve ended long ago Yet deep inside small part wants live part Ill keep going giving isnt blood feel guilt anything overwhelming Even apologize try come terms bad action haunts longer feel normal makes want vanish cant blame anything anyone else clear conscious Deep inside know thats problem feels like theres nothing prevent resolve Im isolated dont make friends go people start befriending usually find way avoid eventually say something shouldnt furthering embarrassment shame People bring stress alone time makes feel bored empty stuck two find difficult work people always biggest struggle mentally exhausting constantly worrying Im perceived said something wrong interacted someone awkward way feel physical pain every day whether headache shoulders back legs feet sometimes even chest arms especially bad left kneeleg NEVER goes away back pain never goes away id say compare level pain knee pain like 5 knee pain 9 constantly tired Even abundance sleep still tired Also feel things meaningless generally know need money survive desire accumulate money things house live empty meaningless life expensive things point rich poor internally feel Sometimes angry meltdowns person see closest friend 1 person would trust behave way front feel like cornered animal scream shout rage anger direction frustrated anger triggered intense helplessness really bad suffer life nothing constant struggle interspersed temporary successes wouldnt describe happiness inevitably end back square one left nothing Depression suicidal thoughts fairly routine broken switching dont care attitudepersona alleviates feelings often causes trouble might distance others isolate etc return quiet type deal consequences takes lot energy switch later dont care switching back forth Theres never anything solid Nothing ever built maintained Everything shortlived Thats theme like groundhog day waking day start nothing never knowing kind bad day coming feel nothing really foundation except past hate wish wasnt pretend isnt try live moment feel empty lost sucks people forget youre sick Youre weird dramatic gloomy hypersensitive mean Thats picture everyone thinks feel like spread toxic vibes everywhere go Routine normal things cause stress Noise causes discomfort longer around girlfriend son extended periods want disappear Theyre acting perfectly normal somehow causes stress Theres real logical reason explain years Ive developed good game face feel like People judge sensitive dramatic tell Im experiencing pain form public watch others carry way socialize interact way carry conversation way walk body language never makes feel different makes feel human Everything comes naturally yet unable act way consistency kills selfesteem confidence Ive gone doctors therapists psychiatrists physical therapists chiropractors Several times feel like 90 time dont feel better visit time worse brings feelings helplessness things since child gets worse every passing day Ive kept quiet part fear Fear could happen family friends could see battled chalked normal stuff people experience time realize debilitating debilitating lived 20s early 30s knowing still physically function alright feel physically sick bone every day youre healthy physically mentally emotionally simultaneously established new medical provider took 3 months get put long waitlist supposed best medical treatment around Im considering literally reading wrote first appointment know would impossibleextremely difficult address one appointment

title: Ect Med Induced Depression Anhedonia
content: heard Electroconvulsive Therapy ECT highly effective treatmentresistant depression also came across someone suffered medicationinduced anhedonia ECT able reverse wonder treatment could work share full story try cover relevant details Three years ago prescribed Antipsychotic Brexpiprazole felt like bullet headit completely destroyed life even though issues taking result developed severe depression total anhedonia intense burning sensation head Later experienced relief Sertraline Aripiprazole unfortunately stopped working time Since tried 20 different medications available country sadly none helped Life become unbearableI cant work study entire life ruined stagnant suggest ECT worth risk List medications tried Antidepressants Sertraline Venlafaxine Desvenlafaxine Clomipramine Paroxetine Mirtazapine Fluoxetine Olanzapine Amitriptyline Fluvoxamine Bupropion Tianeptine Antipsychotics Aripiprazole Risperidone Amisulpride Medications Cerebrolysin Amantadine Pramipexole Rasagiline

title: Guilt anxious attachment relationships
content: sure start hoping ive spent lot time much time finding reading posts Reddit resonate way midtwenties woman grew emotionally distanced father whose love attention unpredictable moods volatile would get angry easily felt things calmer home family female prioritised needs emotions likely receive affection behaving well performing well school submissive never badly behaved kid cant think one serious mistake made child always put fathers needs first Even young age felt conscious lot pressure mature early golden eldest child dad diagnosed cancer young died 19 course affected family relations atmosphere home depressed undergoing lot difficult treatment medication parents tried protect us acting like everything normal think caught later right didnt fully appreciate months died going die felt stupid realised truth understand dads behaviour miss also hold lot anger feel able exist since died currently top university life going relatively well Sometimes question whether would hadnt much pressure child Im sure would chosen path Recently last 6 months reflecting obsessively know anxious attachment style caused lots problems particularly dating life currently healthy happy relationship period life around 3 years ago unhealthy attitude towards men relationships dating etc time felt like catching missed teenage years rebellious casual sex stuff couldnt done past recently ive appreciated desperate loved lonely felt time scared asking people respect love even expressing feel fear pushing someone away one relationship shortlived unhealthy man years older basically used somewhere crash said problematic things fuelled anxiety fears mentioned values attitude align mine yet bowed scraped felt like alternative abandonment wouldnt find anyone else felt like thats deserved wont list things happened unkind took advantage friends hated fucked threatened leave freaked lied pregnant sorts mental gymnastics make sure wouldnt leave told friends abortion knew one would question felt like might finally care given opportunity show cares quickly realised wouldnt work didnt prove didnt feel better Two years later haunted disturbed actions disappointed many levels wanted please someone like willing tell lie also friends Every day haunted memories guilt obsessed thinking past mistakes main thing ashamed behaviour time realising first time low selfesteem whole life also feel ashamed feel ive grown since current relationship also unexpected feel like im better person boyfriend Im always dependent someone recently told close friend lie laughed said deserved glad said im im thinking im thinking something else wrong friendships ended childish behaviours good enough started meditating helped bit couple therapy sessions university ended scared tell therapist feelings hard explain mind active always full guilt Also felt background relevant anxious attachment style low selfconfidence childhood explains lot maybe doesnt im looking excuse mistakes

title: anxious attachment
content: made posts months back believing may narcissism destroying 5 year long friendship Luckily yall assured wasnt made really good point narcissist really selfaware However two three pointed may something called severe anxiety attachment disorder Ill honest never looked deeply afterwards recently started look Everything read definitely matched behavior Everything line preoccupied attachment style specifically context OBSESSED friendship treated like could keep everything together would fix everything demanded constant attention validation everything inbetween Never gave space Never respected boundaries Worse extremely jealous Everything went downhill one day thought talking somebody short began harass calling constantly understandably blocked number ended breaking friendship continued stalk harassno way sugarcoating mind justify thinking want talk Also NEVER stalk harass anybody matter justify eventually stop wont lie though still take peep profile Since though reading problems Happy say pinpoint things finally heal Bought book anxious attachment honestly helped lot plan buying another avoiding profile though strong urges look Still havent looked awhile Made new friend since showing love healthier manner respecting boundaries given space havent felt ounce jealousy Im finally slowly healing mental anguish ex best friend miss dearly weve much together still hurts think sorry isnt going fix things way right better person Hopefully time accomplish

presented something similar money jumped Still insurance money growth opportunity better product etc Shit went south FAST told allegations made sent home Received zero communication two weeks removed get Im constantly hungry perpetually tired hurting people love care unintentionally defense mechanisms manifesting snarky comments dependency others expense Ive trying better deliberate getting natural light exercising working stuff yet cant seem catch goddamn break need two new tires car one leaking spare Ive driving three days cant afford prescriptions helping mental illness also title: Question therapist
content: Hello wanted post see peoples thoughts Ive seeing therapist since 2019 Overall benefits seen improvement life went see due Narcissistic Abuse family five years Ive gut feeling change therapists Im sure right Im overthinking itexpecting much fast Im starting question shes taking money pointmaking therapy dependent reasons lead feel way opens every session well want talk isnt inherently bad dont anyone else talk problems Sure friends cant constantly trauma dump nice tell someone everything support However sometimes wonder direction even going doesnt lead charge much sometimes feel like listen validate isnt worst thing enough point Ive shared many times think CPTSD first time said asked kinda shocked felt like knew understand CPTSD isnt widely recognized also kinda likehow know youre therapist narcissistic abuse survivors Ive told many times intimacy issues Im upper twenties Ive chronically single whole life think big part parents abusive marriage treated overall larger family dynamics lack empathy fakenesstoxic positivity sweeping things rug generational trauma etc Every time mention issue intimacy issues asks think intimacy issues shell say something like well Sometimes get frustrated feel like counselor giving wisdom advice prompting 40 years older get sometimes patient try self evaluate seems lackluster part Whenever Im struggling sleepinsomnia issues shell regurgitate basic notation singsongy tone like ohhhh nooooo know thats good mental health shell suggest mindfulness dont already know constant ruminations abuse parentspeople triggered similar ways Ive mentioned listens doesnt offer much game plan One time even told told thought ruminations mad people abused literally said couldnt tell trying insinuate ruminationsanger result like Critical Parent head kinda messed statement make gets goes bathroom almost every session older likely upper 60s idk medial issue like legit every session shell stand mid conversation like hold thought go bathroom Shell return like 3 min later apologize continue talking ask homework one time next session didnt even really mention opened want talk sexually harassed family member person ended arrested went jail separate person inappropriate complaining one day released prison soon essentially said need cut ribbon outcome situation Like thanksI guess forgot name one time called similar sounding name Granted one time 3 years ago happened since still remember Good things always prompt time flexible sessions willing work meet One time even crisis session back 2020 last minute validates many times tells smart confident etc Essentially positive affirmations Tells good life

title: Huge Anxiety Spike Whats Happening
content: Hello 18 Male freshman college finished first semester end said semester difficulties professor led becoming anxious situation time anxiety grew larger semester ended Ive deal issues one another Usually highschool wouldve breezed hopped XBox play Sonic something anxiety control Im vomiting diarrhea appetite lost much weight point need belts pants used tight even though appetite Im starving try eat end going bathroom vomit dont want get bed anymore Im constantly seeking reassurance Like yeah sometimes need reassurance heres problem already got reassurance everything know everything going okay everything going get resolved anxiety still bad Ever since mild difficulty professor everything causing stress Im constantly unsure every single decision make feel like cant even spell name right anymore check 100 times even though got first time Im even talking friends anymore used talk nonstop Every second day spent scrolling Internet answers reassurance get reassurance need still enough night gets even worse cant sleep spend nighters scrolling scrolling Reddit Google answers already know already went emergency room prescribed something nausea first thought sort stomach flu weve figured since stress cant go get anti anxiety meds anything like stuff gets put record cant afford record also cannot afford actual genuine therapy parents tired told January fix cant go college anymore continues wont able handle classes Whats happening Please help TLDR 18 Male inconvenience college professor Anxiety point grows situations happen Anxiety reached crippling point experiencing vomiting diarrhea loss appetite huge weight loss insomnia antisocial behavior Extremely minor things like writing name cause unreasonable stress Constantly seeking reassurance receives reassurance professionals stress remains Highschool wouldnt react way Edit mean reassurance made decisions constantly reassured others decision point perfect point action unnecessary even gotten professionals reassure know everything going okay However despite topics cause stress still drive spiral anxiety even though usually wouldnt react way Edit 2 added TLDR

father drug addict dealer mother left 3 also consumed drugs would rather pursue kid time 4 turned 14 stuck going back forth Dad Grandmother would get protective orders eachother resulted us moves house house 8 years old forced work dad HVAC school sometimes getting home midnight continued 12 forced take paper route stepmother longer wanted lived 2 bedroom apartment consisted sister 3 younger brothers stepmom father Everynight crammed onto couch sleep days didnt food father step mom drug problems income paper route taken father every week got aid state food stamps wic parents would sell cash buy drugs clothes whatever else wanted whole time lived missed school 6th grade 8th grade went total 193 days December 2013 apartment burned lost everything time got placed grandparents father stuck dick ear took pictures grandmother received photos father arrested got 2 days later never charged Remember said wasnt going school Yeah caught sent away March 4 2014 placed states custody 90 days state could find place put time succeeded school getting best grades ive ever Sadly thats good luck ran placed mother June didnt last long kicked house getting addicted drugs home 3 weeks started selling Xanax Fast forward 2016 Im highschool second almost third time freshman still wasnt going school mother rented apartment never stayed would party generally destroy apartment Well eventually mom quit paying bills got real job taco bell 2 months worked got hooked cocaine wasnt going school manger knew scheduled days worked night shift 11 hours Sometimes would work open close short staffed Coke fueled ability work March3rd 2017 sent psychiatric ward week panic attacks caused drug use Fast forward October 31st 2017 Im court truancy guess got sent away time smoking crack snorting anything could get hands plus selling alot stolen drugs dealer Anyway Im way placement second time want know scarred take multiple drug test know scarred family would finally see like trash mother got report stated everything failed Want list go Herion Cocaine Xanax Weed MDMA GHB favorite Ketamine time placement really well school However kept getting trouble Fighting kids facility staff even visitors got caught cellphone big got option take TASC test GED Test state passed 4 weeks allowed go home Problem home go asked dad could stay Sounds dumb right Yeah know didnt last long eventually got fist fight long story short beat ass pulp happened best friend said hey move march 2018 Im staying friend feel like burden family left moved sister Ive lived ever since Im starting feel like burden well moved got shit together started working fulltime guessed HVAC thing started issues finally come back cut December 2019 got laid due lack work car broke Current date 1920 car still broke still havent found job currently 514 Im enjoy last cigarette ever know people may never read ok come peace self took read thank bottom heart thats first time anyone ever cared enough hear story Thank caring goodbye

title: Nightmares cant anymore
content: seems never really end come waves sometimes two nights row sometimes theyve lasted month straight exhausting body feels heavy chest hurt sometimes arms hurt sometimes head hurt sometimes ill wake screaming sobbing gasping air whimpering thrashing around dreams awful get stuck vivid dream constantly every single night always complex cant live like always even little little kid earliest memories reoccuring nightmares back im nightmares joke nightmares seasons way comes waves wild dreams fine guess really tiresome exhausting alwaysss lived mini different world wake one breaks always something going barely sleep wake frequently hard fall asleep hard go back sleep wake top nightmares constant dreaming period sleep apnea stop breathing ofen sleep got cpap 15 years ago first helped sorta mute dreams still dreamed made notably easier forget dreams waking hours past 4ish months thats case like old days ive tried see maybe cpap isnt working properly working TERRIFIED sleep meds ive seen badly messed mom knew girl died taking sleeping meds wasnt even trying anything crazy sleep ive always scared meds overdosed accidentally kid almost died sleeping meds ahhhh f first time finally tried melatonin till 5 morning scared ive since used helps fall asleep ill wake 3ish hours later usually ive tried smoking weed doesnt seem make significant change ive tried gummies tho hate edibles tried different strans weed notice able fall asleep much change dreams feel hopless sometimes im really angry feel like one knows go one knows impressive carry day day one time never isolated life 2 years moved new state school incredibly alone stopped talking mostly one talk deeeep eating disorder tho nothing else mattered school work slept body checked threw chewed spit food spent LOT energy figuring allowed eat calculating calories ect didnt matter one winning ana company things got tiny bit better break year started loosing hair ect started trying eat meal day ect went month non stop nightmares horrible terrifying gruesome nightmares waking screaming sweating shaking almost like clockwork id force stay awake long possible usually 24 hours body would force sleep like clockwork id wake 2 hours later various distressing states id force stay awake 24 hours would pass cycle began covid times didnt leave place lived alone lived rice eggs month black stuff moved around place absolutely zero memory last 8 hours came looking window decided get therapy wasnt great since didnt really resources school provided therapist focused heavily eating disorder nightmares dreaming never end tho idk much take live like sexually abused throughout childhood mom mentally ill extreme eating disorder mom dad alcoholics bullied severely im thankfully safe environment mostly work sketchy job tho wonderful partner im thing disrupts world even living day im tired im scared sleep

title: Posttherapy withdrawal
content: Hi everyone wondering therapy sessions feel awful Like Ive break although super tough beginning adapt therapy eventually got hang feeling stuff doesnt negate fact waiting impatiently break end therapy feels like Im struggling feel sad depressed afterwards whole week dont want anything see anyone dont wanna except therapy look forward session thats whole world idea life living becomes much darker undesirable eyes break however things neutral first rough week kinda okay didnt feel darkness sadness relationship therapy feels almost like addiction withdrawal type thing Like always want need go withdrawal cant wait next time get dont get happens whats going therapy supposed make feel like phase even though Ive therapy three years pass eventually anyone relate

title: Lexapro withdrawal tremors please read
content: hey get advice Im going WORSE situation prescribed 10mg Escitalopram diagnosed health anxiety panic attacks note Im 18 first nervous taking one somehow took first dose morning get side effects right away like dry mouthed bodily ache day didnt take went doctor brushed saying aches due poor posture agreed dry mouthed anxiety symptoms started take took 3 straight days tapered busy forgot take med experienced known side effects like brain zaps jolts lasted week went doctor told withdraw take flow like every day took 3 days realized tablet made feel dizzy weird restless like didnt medication made decision taking anymore matter depressed stressed day passed withdrawal symptoms started go away kinda felt relaxed little know next morning woke buzzing vibrating feeling body especially head hard describe like outside rather could feel inside lasted hours went away three days straight annoyed couldnt figure causing 3rd day got tremorbuzzing sensation decided take escitalopram made super drowsy day sleepy Suprize next day didnt feel tremors shakiness thought went away didnt take escitalopram continued day passed boom next day tremors came three days still bothering feels like body deseprate dose went neuro physician recommended Librex Pronalenol beta blocker told scared didnt take afraid side effects concern dont want take kind Anti depressant whole life experience worst left feeling miserable want end tremor buzzing feeling well without taking escitalopram guys give hope getting away time soon freak permanent might live normal advice would appreciated Id waiting reply

title: Holding Space Intellectual Honesty Accountability Therapy

contacted many local practitioners many phone calls email exchanges noticed pattern defensiveness deflection asked certain questions therapy interactions suggest pervasive cultural issue within profession particularly troubling example arises prospective clients raise concerns competencies memory conversational continuity sessions Im concerned continuity sessions current therapy sometimes need reexplain important themes narratives significant events Ive already discussed dont expect perfect recall important major themes events tracked handle continuity recall response Ive encountered far often often seems part training wonder youre bothered people forgetting things feel unheard adults child response troubling several reasons Intellectually Dishonest evades answering valid question Patronizing implies clients cant distinguish personal history reasonable professional expectations Manipulative uses therapeutic language deflect accountability Gaslighting converts appropriate expectations symptoms dysfunction professionals charging premium rates 200 deflection egregious pattern also extends broader inquiries practice therapy instance asked inherent tensions maintaining therapeutic frame encouraging authentic engagement even heard responses along lines Im wondering youve struggled structured relationships family handle emotional expression type response turns thoughtful question projection personal dysfunction dismisses client curiosity therapeutic process evidence pathology creating unfalsifiable dynamic effort analyze question framed avoidance Problem experiencing reductive responses stand stark contrast complexity therapists trained navigate Therapists educated nuanced psychological theories hold advanced degrees requiring understanding therapeutic modalities training emphasizes interconnectedness thought emotion Yet confronted intellectually engaged clients challenge frameworks therapists often retreat simplistic eitheror thinking creating troubling power dynamics Intellectual Dominance thoughtful question therapeutic structure gets reframed personal pathology therapists claim authority redefine inquiries resistance positions therapist sole arbiter constitutes valid discourse Circular Control critique therapys power dynamics labeled resistance issues authority creating impossible bind clients engage critically must either suppress curiosity risk pathologized expressing Implications Profession defensive patterns consequences individual therapeutic relationships profession whole compounded broader therapeutic discourse particularly online communities forums therapists feel comfortable speaking candidly spaces anonymity fosters open exchanges Ive observed dismayingly high percentage dismissive attitudes resistance accountability reinforced validated peers Hey dont worry sometimes need show occasionally express empathy let thing probably wont even notice suggests systemic issue extends beyond individual therapists raises ideas therapists consider 1 Gap Accountability Deflecting basic questions continuity structure professional competencies raises concerns professions willingness hold high standards therapists respond substantive questions psychological reframing erodes trust creates sense insecurity therapeutic relationship 2 Cost Avoiding Complexity Therapy embrace clients think critically feeling deeply including examine therapeutic process natural curiosity dismissed resistance clients learn suppress insights creating exactly kind superficial engagement therapy aims transcend 3 Power Imbalances Defensiveness reinforces unhealthy power dynamics undermining collaborative nature therapy strives cultivate Clients feel dismissed misunderstood may withdraw meaningful engagement limiting potential authentic therapeutic work Therapy Improve 1 Acknowledge Paradoxes Accept clients benefit therapy also critiquing structures Recognize metaawareness therapy often sign engagement avoidance 2 Elevate Professional Discourse Engage client observations intellectual level theyre offered Stop labeling analytical thinking resistance Demonstrate critical thinking skills expected advanced degrees 3 Examine Power Dynamics Recognize defensiveness perpetuates unhealthy hierarchies Avoid using therapeutic interpretations shield accountability Address critiques openness dismissal 4 Create Real title: tell parents youre feeling suicidal without overwhelming
content: Hello friends Im 23M Ive struggled anxiety depression past 810 years Ive active suicidal thoughts times past 5 years closest ever came following thoughts overdosing 3rd year university 34 years ago remember bedroom rented room got school sitting chair mental breakdown overwhelmed new environment 3rd year school 2nd year online Covid 19 home remember anxiety bad wouldnt want go upstairs make food houses shared kitchen since socially anxious interacting 3 guys lived upstairs almost starving times great guys btw anxiety really really bad also really worried finding classes late Like every student also multiple assignments felt super overwhelmed wasnt getting hardly sleep either remember 34am nights sitting bed staring nothing rapid thoughts going mind kinds things Majority failure wont able normal tasks people know negative kind thoughts remember day cameback class worrying night missing bus finding classes sat chair broke couldnt control felt body getting achy started get pounding headache almost hyperventilating seemed went closet grabbed bottle Advil waved around bit thought easy would deal remember opened bottle grabbed pill almost idolized didnt want deal anymore moment remember usual thoughts Dont hurt people around suffer long youre gone cant family friends usual thoughts would suicidal thoughts got really bad since dont want hurt people around truly believe thats always reason never went suicidal intentions didnt great people life cared would gone years ago Like heard stories people going afraid death comes afraid wanted free going sameday happened scheduled appointment call schools therapist also think call saved life since nice moment someone talk remember telling holding bottle Advil thoughts amazing listened everything trying say time convinced feelings pass closest suicidal moment since Ive similar moments times life point Im similar suicidal thoughts period right seems past week Ive 2 breakdowns 1 passed pretty quickly wasnt bad deal remember bathroom getting ready shower hit thoughts able find job Canada field studied get kind job matter going get haircut day friend well anxious able find partner crime throughout 23 years planet thoughts going back school another program thoughts parents thinking Im failure thinking letting moving forward life people grew moving forward remember physical symptoms closest taking life episode lasted 1525min remember trying ground sitting floor trying techniques Ive learned years nothing worked let time thing okay 1525min got system parents started notice since Im acting different guess bad way Im lying bed often say told mom would tell whats going gets back trip since came room left saying could tell anything wouldnt upset idea go telling parents something big without scaring dont want Since everyone life always seen happy always smiling individual Like know suicidal thoughts big deal like Im sure lot others deal stuff dont want become burden share mental health struggles Would love know others experiences telling parents loved ones heavy topics went Thanks advance advice thanks reading hope fantastic day
