title: list mostly everything deal
content: Sorry gonna long HIGH SCHOOL bad difficult could still adds stress life super boring super fun main issue first class college class meet every Thursday youre expected read digital textbook complete assignment following Wednesday problem difficult keep cant turn work deadline dont work till nearing deadline cant work home elaborated Ive missed assignments time Im exhausted get home MENTAL HEALTH ADHD reason cant schoolwork unless Im school Executive dysfunction makes cant shower unless parents arent home cant brush teeth cant exercise cant wash hands exceptions cant wear underwear makes practically impossible stay hygienic theres overstimulation makes everything Im dealing harder deal Medicine helps much actually appointment Monday Im always seeking dopamine dont get often actually hate weekends got nothing makes bored increases anxiety elaborated OCD ADHDs right hand man turns increases anxiety Im bored since nothing distract Part cant shower unless parents arent home People look like Im crazy touch things specific way type weird pattern leave bathroom immediately flushing part dont wash hands Im public restroom flush toilet plug ears loud OCD Intrusive thoughts galore often difficult tell violent thought intrusive usually feel happier thoughts also habit nail biting finger toe pulling hair nail biting disfigured nails often times theres dried blood Since rarely wash hands biting nails spreads hundreds germs things touch Autism gonna elaborate much since similar ADHD Im entirely sure diagnosed elementary diagnosis changed ADHD mid 2022 Pretty likely since brother autistic half people ADHD also autism Depression result ADHD OCD Especially everything going right Ive feeling hopeless day day Idk Im exhausted school Ive tired recently Antidepressants worked past cant tell theyre still working Entertainment controller broke last week Im supposed getting new one next week rely YouTube Reddit music Balatro Nothing new YouTube lots politics Reddit elaborated later much entertainment music Balatro slowly becoming boring feels like everyday especially since cant use Playstation till next week Identity Never thought Id question sexuality gender stopped caring dating sex realized dont understand women nothing dont get understand men one hormones Im attracted women physically cant understand mentally realization Ive identified aroace However seeing lesbian porn seriously asked girl Id attracted women physically mentally led lot introspection research hate say Im scared transition mean deep voice Im 6 foot tall super hairy enjoy people consider masculine things Ive seen incredible transitions doesnt look amazing immediately tried looking feminine one night embarrassing even though one else saw also dangerous transition right orange bastard costly parents wouldnt support Recently questioned agender discovering gender use anymore kind document list gender prefer say put male Somewhat related dad wants start going church Im agnosticatheist Ive agnosticatheist since sophomore year content belief dad know thinks Im Christian Thankfully hes smart enough respect beliefs said hell always support matter beliefs doesnt stop afraid telling Im atheist though Politics one thing worrying gonna go deep Im gonna say theres demented tangerine office butchering government making laughing stock US Sic semper tyrannis PHYSICAL HEALTH Temperature get extremely hot extremely easily get hot refuse wear pants coats matter temp small room 2 machines running bad AC old fan Without fan Fall room nearly 100F seriously checked causes sweat lot thus making smell bad feel bad brings next issue Showering try shower least twice week usually 3 times week used able shower every day Ive trying shower often Remember shower parents arent home cant drive around either purpose going letting shower Since dont wear underwear fat sweat lot doesnt much Id hoped clammy wet skin coldness showering also sucks Teeth cant brush teeth havent brushed teeth maybe half year Ive 2 3 cavities either removed filled past years way kinda brush via dry washcloth even dont often cant deal gritty teeth shitty flavor inedible properties toothpaste Guess finding toothpaste actually works still cant use see videos massive chunks calculus removed dentists think think thats gonna primarily drink soda milk primarily eat potato chips pizza fast food vegan meat brings next issue Obesity Im roughly 6 feet tall weigh roughly 280 pounds 17 years old makes obese Idgaf others think weight dont think obesity makes ugly think makes unhealthy though buy ice cream fries McDonalds least week often twice week Ive tried quitting soda tried quitting potato chips Ive done neither Sun Drop favorite drink since could walk However Ive made big step pretty proud quit caffeine drink caffeine free Coke Still extremely unhealthy hey something also dont drink water situation Id drink water Im extremely thirsty theres nothing else available Extremely cold water nice cant get extremely cold fast dont eat much usually 1 2 meals day sone snacks Im still hungry Since get hot exhausted dont exercise think eating meat healthier eating meat Im vegetarian Eyes 2 parts strain sight Given stare screen like 10 hours day often get eye strain twitches former bad headache makes tired latter makes want rip eyes light always room usually 2 screens 247 use blue light filter dim brightness still get strain twitches Although eventually got used strain affecting recently since Ive looking phone lot cant use Playstation Last night worst could barely keep eyes open pretty much fell asleep soon got home Acetaminophen hit miss ibuprofen doesnt work onto sight left eye tendency drift left happening Im typing weirdly makes easier see cant remember name astigmatism lights give spiky glares trouble seeing far away glasses dont use Tried contacts anything touches eyes immediately makes shut tight sight isnt bad makes sad cant see Kahoot answers lol Neck Looking MacBook phone day puts lot strain back neck bad definitely makes neck achy hurts evening Nausea Since Ive anxious recently stomach sensitive usual ached usual drink lot milk Im title: dont think family survive mental health crisis Help
content: start written post numerous times write download Reddit paste whatever community find never use Reddit dont really know works need post another community suggest different one please let know erase hit post think venting even one feel little better go back know best avoiding problem Im posting time around cant keep Im riddled guilt everyday depressed anxious overwhelmed Nobody family seems care besides grandma shes getting old help shes kinda crazy Long story short mom diagnosed schizophrenia 2020 Around time nursing school drop take care due mental health never went back cared first 2 years diagnosis Took doctors appointments appointments drove around town trying give sense normalcy would go grocery shopping get nails done got everything needed cooked cleaned etc caretaker since nobody else seemed care dad picture barely think hates us Ill explain dad best way verbally abusive alcoholic narcissistic asshole cares money anything used money form control since child mom never worked dad held head last 25 years always hearing need get job dont shit around etc always shouted around house mom always kept house clean laundry everything wife supposed dad always hated Even day calls names ridicules despite going think reason turned way another reason daughter died suddenly 5 step sister died born dad wont leave money mom cant leave isnt mentally competent anymore describe mom hard love death also want honest affects dont want offend anyone really need someone see mom acts like 7 year old thats also broken record havent intelligent interaction convo 5 years Even wasnt much better numbed drugs alcohol reminder childhood might go far say Ive never true meaningful conversation ever drug choice vodka Xanax Im sorry isnt allowed think important story almost died times times almost died suicide mental hospitals younger swept rug 2020 hell broke loose doctors say went psychosis completely detached reality mom mean bone body became violent acted ways like possessed actually need go therapy blocked asked broken mircowave brother said ripped microwave wall threw across room mean god pretty strong right also 3 brothers 2 younger older brother Autism Older brother dads favorite dads words think hes well Im trying offend anyone please think kids hate except one legally child dependent forever easily susceptible manipulation anything dad says Including bully mom hate brainwashed bullied us lives manipulated long sell lie perfect family never existed first place live small town grew around extended family know dad asshole dont think know hes done Last Christmas family get together weird strange mom like huge elephant room everyone kind tip toes around fact acts different avoiding time engaging Almost like alienating us cant think better way describe like blatantly like talking good time meanwhile awkwardly stand side literally time literally feel like Im probably confusing inside family feel slight little jabs slight cant really raise problem bc everyone nice words actions majority time confuses makes feel crazy picking anything point cant say anything dont know else say besides dance around problem basically want scream HUGE PROBLEM DYING didnt mention married got married 4 months ago amazing man saved knows spilled many times talked together cant come solutions conversations end yeah dont know classic well Weve basically come conclusion cant control people best avoid cut toxicity life got married thats Since new year house twice birthday Valentines Day husband suggested cut killing said every time came looked dead like life sucked true dont know else explain mom dad brothers sucked life everyday hit nail head one thing 4 months later dont heart block mom still answer calls sometimes None fault feel guilty problems beyond much Ive tried help doctors would never listen grandma made difficult ways whole story Theres many levels feel liked id never able explain detail basically mom declining rapidly since diagnosis dont recognize anymore even physically doesnt look eyes almost stares straight saw glimpse Easter last year went away fast came days hate mom wish death feel bad NEVER mean mother face aside teen years doesnt deserve let take best scream later husband think might dementia way repeats often asks questions doctors say schizophrenia bc 55 stopped trying get like really believe mom long gone Ill never see feel like already dead except still get nonstop texts day everyday mean like never stop muted havent brought block Calls come every hour hour got message iPhone storage full come find messages taking storage phone delete moms texts duh crashed phone came 55000 text messages sat recently deleted phone crashed deleted folder thing always tried text least day days even weeks couldnt bring text really doesnt matter Nothing stops sporadic incessant messages kind gave aint reading decided include messages still repeat 100s times Ive told text messages works always see dont reply still see message reply basically send thing answer harassing overwhelming get sick thinking writes Sometimes take peek Im filled dread things says Im going much longer Im mom ever going please come see coming Please come come Dads mean coming come today tomorrow please coming Guilt trip guilt trip constantly begging come see tells people dont come see everyone makes bad guy also writes letters husband Every Single Day deleted majority text messages include within last month begging even light end tunnel even though still escaped dont know ever father law tells stories relates dad dementia treated terribly 50 something 27 dad 80 mom 55 doesnt seem relatable began life trying anyway new husband navigating young adult people age dont worry parents Ive raise mine even day dad nothing work drink abuse everyone house acts like victim saying things like cant handle anymore mom insane crying next thing terrible human opinion mean old nasty drunk good nothing except money mention millionaire still wont get mom help needs SUE FUCKING DAD POINT think Ill end please let know need elaborate give story dont want keep rambling feel like explained important parts keep getting sucked back world Whether guilt eating alive something else idk keep dont know else avoiding stupid going back stupid anything know answer probably black white think mom mentally ill deserving proper care instead still getting abused day day call stuff like police never helped doctors dont help Ive even bad experience lawyer Claimed needed fathers assets qualify divorce surprise would give us lol title: Constant Hobby Bouncing Ruining Relationship

title: baddest panic attack adult life scared happen
content: TRIGGER WARNING Bad case panic attack Ive bit shopping already trying calm anxiety Backstory months ago body went full Parkinson mode taking Lithium quitting fast ended neurology ward hospital underwent CT Lumbar Punction MRI found nothing neurological still gave Levodopa still taking symptoms vanished physical normal really nice lately breathing issues example wake gasping air andor force body breathe scares probably sleep apnea sometimes even feels body lazy breathe manually see lung specialist doctor said dose Levodopa seems high Also listed side effects effect breathing talk neurology doctor Great almost immediately got panic attack managed calm Since scared Sometimes chilling starting feel dizzy take DEEP breath stopped breathing without noticing typing Fast forward afternoon wanted go shopping Look summer clothes home already felt weird Tried shake stay calm shop walked around growing concerned Thinking asking staff sit somewhere instead went outside Wanted sit bench soon started walk felt dizzy thought pass thought public people would steal stuff decided go Caf order water Inside stopped thought asking help looked staff helplessly turning headphones didnt notice highly unwell looked table went Sat Felt bad Anxiety rising server came asked okay told think panic attack asked want water nodded brought couldnt move fingers anymore asked straw brought one asked stay Tried calm said knows Thats happened whole body except eye area back head started tingling like mad hands fingers cramped stiffened couldnt move anymore lung started tingling scared would die couldnt breathe got loud guests looked Told breathe calmly Asked need water server said already Thanked couldnt move face anymore barely could talk scary finally calmed apologized guests assured okay One even offered order tea politely declined saying water thats enough thanked attack started server called ambulance asked finally saw brought hospital right waiting psych doc drew blood thrice look oxygen level Thrice first two times accidentally drew vein instead artery checked blood pressure oxygen level test thingy get put finger dont know stay night dont know come back home Thankfully town pretty walkable tho walk back bicycle go home scared Scared happen nobody stay even tho housemates Scared pass worse Ive panic attacks since childhood never like screamed thought dying never cramped Ever months ago scared today first time bad couldnt even really move arms anymore hospital finally could move arms bad tremor scared would permanently gone fingers still tingle breathing normal think hope doctor help least

title: ADHD laziness burnout
content: Hey Ive recently realized pattern Im hoping get insight Im 35F undiagnoseduntreated ADHD couple years ago Ever since started school earliest memories kindergarten felt completely stifled around kids time started skipping days avoid completely medical issues kid well played absences mainly remember able go days knowing barely graduated high school due absences Entering workforce quickly started feeling stifled lack better word feeling absences work started becoming pattern well throughout 20s Id maybe couple years tops Id burn completely get new job repeat Even jobs liked much time couldnt handle anymore Id feel burned Id find something else Ive never problem keeping job Ive always one quit found something else Im job actually enjoy good recently got hit wave depression full dayweek incredibly challenging started antidepressants hoping get relief kick next weeks pattern throughout life depressed Im wondering whats going Im therapy talking psychiatrists Ive mentioned hasnt turned much discussion Ive looking remote jobs keep options open pretty competitive wondering Id better environment insight helpful sorry long post

title: Advice BurnoutCortisol Addiction Depression
content: Hi youre taking time read thank much appreciate Im 17 yo Hispanic American female currently senior year pretty intense college prep high school ADHD well OCD Anxiety struggled four years Despite mental health struggles able keep 40 top 10 class stay involved extracurriculars pretty well testing given chance apply competitive colleges told senior year would fun year thats kind Ive holding onto tough times high school soon Ill senior year finally able let loose fun spend time friends far senior year anything Im 4 APs research leading student government MUN Im meetings lunches hate lunch get see friends beginning year thought gotta lock really hard first two months submit college apps Ill done finally relax didinitially waking weekends 6 work Id work day seemingly never finish work everything takes longer thanks ADHD even still felt fulfilled motivated wake early work Nov 1 rolled around didnt feel immense sense relief Id expected submitted EDEA applicationsjust fear resultsdecisions Ive applied 914 colleges last couple deadlines November 15th know feeling little relieved Ive feeling sounmotivated sad overall Im usually motivated study want well assignments honestly Im usually interested material like learning th se past couple weeks justcant spent HOURS literally nothing trying build energymotivation study even try sit work study always get sleepy Im TIRED time Like today took like 2 4 hour naps lot want get done get plate try relax try waking early weekends end wasting time cant work makes feel even unmotivated guilty mad high expectations cant reach feel like failure ik isnt great Ive getting less less sleep seeing friends less less biting nails making time work eat healthy would like despite Im also even getting work donebeing productive feel lost endless cycle homework tests application deadlines seeing friends grades havent started slip yet Im worried rate things going CANT find want work Even sadder think Ive lost passion curiosity usually feel towards learning Im AP Physics hate omg like never simultaneously uninterested terrible subject results recent election cough cough stressful family could contributing burnout Idk dont usually post Reddit literally idea think must burnout right like cortisol addiction want happy feel less stressed enjoy last year high school w friends really want feel excitement learning things school used bring dont know anymore somehow read thank much know lot would really really appreciate advice good daynight wherever are3

title: Struggle Loneliness Weed Addiction Flight Attendant
content: Ive always passion travel flight attendant seemed like perfect job get explore world meet new people freedom skies theres side job one ever talks loneliness away home days time constantly moving different cities spending long hours planes incredibly isolating Even Im surrounded people often feel completely alone Ive made friends along way come go time spent hotel rooms airports unfamiliar places hard explain others sense loneliness overwhelming sometimes first thought could handle told excitement travel thrill job would enough keep happy time loneliness started eat away days would stretch weight alone unfamiliar city would start feel heavier needed something cope emptiness felt Thats turned marijuana started way unwind long flights stressful days little puff numb emotions ease stress away home began something thought would help quickly turned addiction relief gave felt good became way coping everything anxiety sadness isolation found reaching vape pen first days every night every moment alone Even layovers flights would find quiet spot escape haze smoke became crutch way dealing feelings couldnt face headon began rely calm nerves quiet negative thoughts gave instant sense relief didnt last long problem know Im risking job know Im could jeopardize everything Ive worked Ive heard stories others whove lost jobs due substance use deep know Im walking dangerous line moments loneliness everything feels heavy bear seems like way survive like Ive become addicted weed escape provides Ive tried stop harder imagined pull addiction strong difficult face loneliness without something take edge Im starting realize cant keep going path dont want lose career health future addiction need find another way cope confront feelings deal loneliness healthier way Im sharing story know Im one feels way others struggling silence using substances numb pain loneliness isolation doesnt way Im learning reaching help talking others finding healthier outlets emotions first steps reclaiming life wont easy Im ready face challenges headon Im ready let go crutch start living life sense purpose clarity journey Im determined take next step toward healing

title: SSRI withdraw ZOLOFT
content: took 25m zoloft 3 months stopped 4 days feeling fine 9 4th day went go lay head sudden felt heavy went go stand everything blurry heart racing 150bmp every 10 minutes felt like going faint time went ER told bc stopped taking medication suddenly Therefore started taking next day lights bothering Like everything seemed dim fuzzy getting paranoid thought going pass time flu like symptoms couldnt stand without feeling dizzy disoriented like crazy continued taking medicine hopes would get better Physically feel ok mentally feel like Im going insane told doctor want completely never want take antidepressants lowered prescription half dose slowly get correct way still feel disoriented Ive severe panic attacks point feels like Im tripping drugs anxiety non stop roof past couple weeks think better vision feels like Im disconnected reality like fuzzy read everything fine almost like Im actually Like Im simulation feel cant actually focus anything want know go back normal long anyone else experienced want hope please going third week dont know much take

title: Effexor withdrawal
content: Please anyone advice Zoloft 2 years got post partum depression started become issue made anxious switch effexor Great wasnt anxious man ever angry never felt agitated life want stab snow even kidding therapy going well came conclusion dont need anymore tapered took last February 28th Next day never felt sick life fell asleep half couch two kids played feet Luckily husband working home week still take extra strength naproxen like medication also post concussion syndrome multiple natural tablets gravol dont get dependant morning feel fine sleep like friggen rock since went hard time waking husband PHYSICALLY pick feel like flu Im okay 230pm hits holy shit hill Chills muscle weakness vomiting cant eat even look anything slightly slimy matter end laying hour thats fair kids theyre 3 thank goodness theyre angels still idk Anxiety decreased atleast stressing feel sick doctor wont answer phone pharmacist idea shes talking Anybody go withdrawal SIDE EFFEXOR

title: tell parents youre feeling suicidal without overwhelming
content: Hello friends Im 23M Ive struggled anxiety depression past 810 years Ive active suicidal thoughts times past 5 years closest ever came following thoughts overdosing 3rd year university 34 years ago remember bedroom rented room got school sitting chair mental breakdown overwhelmed new environment 3rd year school 2nd year online Covid 19 home remember anxiety bad wouldnt want go upstairs make food houses shared kitchen since socially anxious interacting 3 guys lived upstairs almost starving times great guys btw anxiety really really bad also really worried finding classes late Like every student also multiple assignments felt super overwhelmed wasnt getting hardly sleep either remember 34am nights sitting bed staring nothing rapid thoughts going mind kinds things Majority failure wont able normal tasks people know negative kind thoughts remember day cameback class worrying night missing bus finding classes sat chair broke couldnt control felt body getting achy started get pounding headache almost hyperventilating seemed went closet grabbed bottle Advil waved around bit thought easy would deal remember opened bottle grabbed pill almost idolized didnt want deal anymore moment remember usual thoughts Dont hurt people around suffer long youre gone cant family friends usual thoughts would suicidal thoughts got really bad since dont want hurt people around truly believe thats always reason never went suicidal intentions didnt great people life cared would gone years ago Like heard stories people going afraid death comes afraid wanted free going sameday happened scheduled appointment call schools therapist also think call saved life since nice moment someone talk remember telling holding bottle Advil thoughts amazing listened everything trying say time convinced feelings pass closest suicidal moment since Ive similar moments times life point Im similar suicidal thoughts period right seems past week Ive 2 breakdowns 1 passed pretty quickly wasnt bad deal remember bathroom getting ready shower hit thoughts able find job Canada field studied get kind job matter going get haircut day friend well anxious able find partner crime throughout 23 years planet thoughts going back school another program thoughts parents thinking Im failure thinking letting moving forward life people grew moving forward remember physical symptoms closest taking life episode lasted 1525min remember trying ground sitting floor trying techniques Ive learned years nothing worked let time thing okay 1525min got system parents started notice since Im acting different guess bad way Im lying bed often say told mom would tell whats going gets back trip since came room left saying could tell anything wouldnt upset idea go telling parents something big without scaring dont want Since everyone life always seen happy always smiling individual Like know suicidal thoughts big deal like Im sure lot others deal stuff dont want become burden share mental health struggles Would love know others experiences telling parents loved ones heavy topics went Thanks advance advice thanks reading hope fantastic day

title: tell parents youre feeling suicidal without overwhelming
content: Hello friends Im 23M Ive struggled anxiety depression past 810 years Ive active suicidal thoughts times past 5 years closest ever came following thoughts overdosing 3rd year university 34 years ago remember bedroom rented room got school sitting chair mental breakdown overwhelmed new environment 3rd year school 2nd year online Covid 19 home remember anxiety bad wouldnt want go upstairs make food houses shared kitchen since socially anxious interacting 3 guys lived upstairs almost starving times great guys btw anxiety really really bad also really worried finding classes late Like every student also multiple assignments felt super overwhelmed wasnt getting hardly sleep either remember 34am nights sitting bed staring nothing rapid thoughts going mind kinds things Majority failure wont able normal tasks people know negative kind thoughts remember day cameback class worrying night missing bus finding classes sat chair broke couldnt control felt body getting achy started get pounding headache almost hyperventilating seemed went closet grabbed bottle Advil waved around bit thought easy would deal remember opened bottle grabbed pill almost idolized didnt want deal anymore moment remember usual thoughts Dont hurt people around suffer long youre gone cant family friends usual thoughts would suicidal thoughts got really bad since dont want hurt people around truly believe thats always reason never went suicidal intentions didnt great people life cared would gone years ago Like heard stories people going afraid death comes afraid wanted free going sameday happened scheduled appointment call schools therapist also think call saved life since nice moment someone talk remember telling holding bottle Advil thoughts amazing listened everything trying say time convinced feelings pass closest suicidal moment since Ive similar moments times life point Im similar suicidal thoughts period right seems past week Ive 2 breakdowns 1 passed pretty quickly wasnt bad deal remember bathroom getting ready shower hit thoughts able find job Canada field studied get kind job matter going get haircut day friend well anxious able find partner crime throughout 23 years planet thoughts going back school another program thoughts parents thinking Im failure thinking letting moving forward life people grew moving forward remember physical symptoms closest taking life episode lasted 1525min remember trying ground sitting floor trying techniques Ive learned years nothing worked let time thing okay 1525min got system parents started notice since Im acting different guess bad way Im lying bed often say told mom would tell whats going gets back trip since came room left saying could tell anything wouldnt upset idea go telling parents something big without scaring dont want Since everyone life always seen happy always smiling individual Like know suicidal thoughts big deal like Im sure lot others deal stuff dont want become burden share mental health struggles Would love know others experiences telling parents loved ones heavy topics went Thanks advance advice thanks reading hope fantastic day

title: list mostly everything deal
content: Sorry gonna long HIGH SCHOOL bad difficult could still adds stress life super boring super fun main issue first class college class meet every Thursday youre expected read digital textbook complete assignment following Wednesday problem difficult keep cant turn work deadline dont work till nearing deadline cant work home elaborated Ive missed assignments time Im exhausted get home MENTAL HEALTH ADHD reason cant schoolwork unless Im school Executive dysfunction makes cant shower unless parents arent home cant brush teeth cant exercise cant wash hands exceptions cant wear underwear makes practically impossible stay hygienic theres overstimulation makes everything Im dealing harder deal Medicine helps much actually appointment Monday Im always seeking dopamine dont get often actually hate weekends got nothing makes bored increases anxiety elaborated OCD ADHDs right hand man turns increases anxiety Im bored since nothing distract Part cant shower unless parents arent home People look like Im crazy touch things specific way type weird pattern leave bathroom immediately flushing part dont wash hands Im public restroom flush toilet plug ears loud OCD Intrusive thoughts galore often difficult tell violent thought intrusive usually feel happier thoughts also habit nail biting finger toe pulling hair nail biting disfigured nails often times theres dried blood Since rarely wash hands biting nails spreads hundreds germs things touch Autism gonna elaborate much since similar ADHD Im entirely sure diagnosed elementary diagnosis changed ADHD mid 2022 Pretty likely since brother autistic half people ADHD also autism Depression result ADHD OCD Especially everything going right Ive feeling hopeless day day Idk Im exhausted school Ive tired recently Antidepressants worked past cant tell theyre still working Entertainment controller broke last week Im supposed getting new one next week rely YouTube Reddit music Balatro Nothing new YouTube lots politics Reddit elaborated later much entertainment music Balatro slowly becoming boring feels like everyday especially since cant use Playstation till next week Identity Never thought Id question sexuality gender stopped caring dating sex realized dont understand women nothing dont get understand men one hormones Im attracted women physically cant understand mentally realization Ive identified aroace However seeing lesbian porn seriously asked girl Id attracted women physically mentally led lot introspection research hate say Im scared transition mean deep voice Im 6 foot tall super hairy enjoy people consider masculine things Ive seen incredible transitions doesnt look amazing immediately tried looking feminine one night embarrassing even though one else saw also dangerous transition right orange bastard costly parents wouldnt support Recently questioned agender discovering gender use anymore kind document list gender prefer say put male Somewhat related dad wants start going church Im agnosticatheist Ive agnosticatheist since sophomore year content belief dad know thinks Im Christian Thankfully hes smart enough respect beliefs said hell always support matter beliefs doesnt stop afraid telling Im atheist though Politics one thing worrying gonna go deep Im gonna say theres demented tangerine office butchering government making laughing stock US Sic semper tyrannis PHYSICAL HEALTH Temperature get extremely hot extremely easily get hot refuse wear pants coats matter temp small room 2 machines running bad AC old fan Without fan Fall room nearly 100F seriously checked causes sweat lot thus making smell bad feel bad brings next issue Showering try shower least twice week usually 3 times week used able shower every day Ive trying shower often Remember shower parents arent home cant drive around either purpose going letting shower Since dont wear underwear fat sweat lot doesnt much Id hoped clammy wet skin coldness showering also sucks Teeth cant brush teeth havent brushed teeth maybe half year Ive 2 3 cavities either removed filled past years way kinda brush via dry washcloth even dont often cant deal gritty teeth shitty flavor inedible properties toothpaste Guess finding toothpaste actually works still cant use see videos massive chunks calculus removed dentists think think thats gonna primarily drink soda milk primarily eat potato chips pizza fast food vegan meat brings next issue Obesity Im roughly 6 feet tall weigh roughly 280 pounds 17 years old makes obese Idgaf others think weight dont think obesity makes ugly think makes unhealthy though buy ice cream fries McDonalds least week often twice week Ive tried quitting soda tried quitting potato chips Ive done neither Sun Drop favorite drink since could walk However Ive made big step pretty proud quit caffeine drink caffeine free Coke Still extremely unhealthy hey something also dont drink water situation Id drink water Im extremely thirsty theres nothing else available Extremely cold water nice cant get extremely cold fast dont eat much usually 1 2 meals day sone snacks Im still hungry Since get hot exhausted dont exercise think eating meat healthier eating meat Im vegetarian Eyes 2 parts strain sight Given stare screen like 10 hours day often get eye strain twitches former bad headache makes tired latter makes want rip eyes light always room usually 2 screens 247 use blue light filter dim brightness still get strain twitches Although eventually got used strain affecting recently since Ive looking phone lot cant use Playstation Last night worst could barely keep eyes open pretty much fell asleep soon got home Acetaminophen hit miss ibuprofen doesnt work onto sight left eye tendency drift left happening Im typing weirdly makes easier see cant remember name astigmatism lights give spiky glares trouble seeing far away glasses dont use Tried contacts anything touches eyes immediately makes shut tight sight isnt bad makes sad cant see Kahoot answers lol Neck Looking MacBook phone day puts lot strain back neck bad definitely makes neck achy hurts evening Nausea Since Ive anxious recently stomach sensitive usual ached usual drink lot milk Im lactoseintolerant good drink usually dont bathroom issues though thats nice Combined eye strain feels like torture Hand Washing wash hands get something stickyslimy Im prepare food culinary class shower wash wiping ass assuming dont get shit try use hand sanitizer much often forget Theres probably health section lets move FINANCES Food household stuff 100 week Gas Idk probably quite bit Bills Dont ask Medicine 200 month Subscriptions embarrassing amount may seem like lot parents combined make roughly 50k live paycheck paycheck Even mom getting second job struggle still file insurance claim driveway Hurricane Helene turned bottom rally track way Im getting job soon theres way much plate already COLLEGE Jfc fill scholarships keep FAFSA file housing go open house schedule tour buy essentials qualify solo dorm cant roommate circumstances need get thousands dollars real chance Ill fail drop deal even anxiety Im college Im scared independent Without saying goal take several years qualified enough work dream job cost tens thousands dollars opportunity pass DOGS 2 cute dogs Bandit Cedar Theyre collies brother sister love dearly However everytime hear bark everytime see vomit everytime smell shit lose small bit little sanity left Cedars bark specifically made walk 2 football fields away house could still vaguely hear Like said love dogs Ill damned EVER get another dog human ability handle without freaking tf go school come back home exhausted take meds shower go hot dark room turn youtube playlist Ive watching weeks eat vegan meat play Hollow Knight could use Playstation scroll Reddit lose hope seeing news article Trump listen music try go sleep worrying future trying cope mental health getting unhealthy day goes Sorry extremely long post put everything causes stress single post get head straight TLDR Everything terrible

title: dont think family survive mental health crisis Help
content: start written post numerous times write download Reddit paste whatever community find never use Reddit dont really know works need post another community suggest different one please let know erase hit post think venting even one feel little better go back know best avoiding problem Im posting time around cant keep Im riddled guilt everyday depressed anxious overwhelmed Nobody family seems care besides grandma shes getting old help shes kinda crazy Long story short mom diagnosed schizophrenia 2020 Around time nursing school drop take care due mental health never went back cared first 2 years diagnosis Took doctors appointments appointments drove around town trying give sense normalcy would go grocery shopping get nails done got everything needed cooked cleaned etc caretaker since nobody else seemed care dad picture barely think hates us Ill explain dad best way verbally abusive alcoholic narcissistic asshole cares money anything used money form control since child mom never worked dad held head last 25 years always hearing need get job dont shit around etc always shouted around house mom always kept house clean laundry everything wife supposed dad always hated Even day calls names ridicules despite going think reason turned way another reason daughter died suddenly 5 step sister died born dad wont leave money mom cant leave isnt mentally competent anymore describe mom hard love death also want honest affects dont want offend anyone really need someone see mom acts like 7 year old thats also broken record havent intelligent interaction convo 5 years Even wasnt much better numbed drugs alcohol reminder childhood might go far say Ive never true meaningful conversation ever drug choice vodka Xanax Im sorry isnt allowed think important story almost died times times almost died suicide mental hospitals younger swept rug 2020 hell broke loose doctors say went psychosis completely detached reality mom mean bone body became violent acted ways like possessed actually need go therapy blocked asked broken mircowave brother said ripped microwave wall threw across room mean god pretty strong right also 3 brothers 2 younger older brother Autism Older brother dads favorite dads words think hes well Im trying offend anyone please think kids hate except one legally child dependent forever easily susceptible manipulation anything dad says Including bully mom hate brainwashed bullied us lives manipulated long sell lie perfect family never existed first place live small town grew around extended family know dad asshole dont think know hes done Last Christmas family get together weird strange mom like huge elephant room everyone kind tip toes around fact acts different avoiding time engaging Almost like alienating us cant think better way describe like blatantly like talking good time meanwhile awkwardly stand side literally time literally feel like Im probably confusing inside family feel slight little jabs slight cant really raise problem bc everyone nice words actions majority time confuses makes feel crazy picking anything point cant say anything dont know else say besides dance around problem basically want scream HUGE PROBLEM DYING didnt mention married got married 4 months ago amazing man saved knows spilled many times talked together cant come solutions conversations end yeah dont know classic well Weve basically come conclusion cant control people best avoid cut toxicity life got married thats Since new year house twice birthday Valentines Day husband suggested cut killing said every time came looked dead like life sucked true dont know else explain mom dad brothers sucked life everyday hit nail head one thing 4 months later dont heart block mom still answer calls sometimes None fault feel guilty problems beyond much Ive tried help doctors would never listen grandma made difficult ways whole story Theres many levels feel liked id never able explain detail basically mom declining rapidly since diagnosis dont recognize anymore even physically doesnt look eyes almost stares straight saw glimpse Easter last year went away fast came days hate mom wish death feel bad NEVER mean mother face aside teen years doesnt deserve let take best scream later husband think might dementia way repeats often asks questions doctors say schizophrenia bc 55 stopped trying get like really believe mom long gone Ill never see feel like already dead except still get nonstop texts day everyday mean like never stop muted havent brought block Calls come every hour hour got message iPhone storage full come find messages taking storage phone delete moms texts duh crashed phone came 55000 text messages sat recently deleted phone crashed deleted folder thing always tried text least day days even weeks couldnt bring text really doesnt matter Nothing stops sporadic incessant messages kind gave aint reading decided include messages still repeat 100s times Ive told text messages works always see dont reply still see message reply basically send thing answer harassing overwhelming get sick thinking writes Sometimes take peek Im filled dread things says Im going much longer Im mom ever going please come see coming Please come come Dads mean coming come today tomorrow please coming Guilt trip guilt trip constantly begging come see tells people dont come see everyone makes bad guy also writes letters husband Every Single Day deleted majority text messages include within last month begging even light end tunnel even though still escaped dont know ever father law tells stories relates dad dementia treated terribly 50 something 27 dad 80 mom 55 doesnt seem relatable began life trying anyway new husband navigating young adult people age dont worry parents Ive raise mine even day dad nothing work drink abuse everyone house acts like victim saying things like cant handle anymore mom insane crying next thing terrible human opinion mean old nasty drunk good nothing except money mention millionaire still wont get mom help needs SUE FUCKING DAD POINT think Ill end please let know need elaborate give story dont want keep rambling feel like explained important parts keep getting sucked back world Whether guilt eating alive something else idk keep dont know else avoiding stupid going back stupid anything know answer probably black white think mom mentally ill deserving proper care instead still getting abused day day call stuff like police never helped doctors dont help Ive even bad experience lawyer Claimed needed fathers assets qualify divorce surprise would give us lol lawyer refused help us even hearing story think Im wits end exhausted efforts best abilities TLDR mom schizophrenic still getting abused dad finally house married trying start life feel like keep getting sucked back getting eaten alive guilt dont know anymore

title: feels like falling apart
content: 17 years old boy trapped cycle selfdestruction procrastinate watch porn vape carve pain skin five years nothing ghost friends one family lost vices drowns presence Often want disappear forever 18 girl heart big world calls people pleaser Unfortunately gives theres nothing left Life never made things easy People used betrayed left scars deep fade Shes lost good friends suffered panic attacks steal air lungs believes doesnt deserve food doesnt deserve care cuts tried die yet somehow found started three months ago night tried end life morning came still wrote Poured pain Reddit post hoping someone anyone would hear one sent message Told sorry deserved Gave words never knew needed thanked thinking end next day asked eaten drunk enough water time barely ate answered answered Soon spoke every day Hours passing like seconds unraveled everythingour pasts fears dreams pieces never dared show world judgment shame understanding Weeks passed understood One evening bought flowers took picture told meant world quiet first told loved moment later said back felt right grew closer Every whispered love every wish could hold every want fall asleep beside wake warmth pulled us deeper something neither us ever known us first relationship came desire thought ignited something inside longing touch Neither us ever known intimacy together would Slowly Gently Desperately act connection feeling real others arms wants want developed passionate fantasies together tells would give completely says world cruel six thousand kilometers apart Dont speak language English bad leaves room calls video words screen trapped distance silence unbearable Im also scared direct contact complicated loves every piece know cannot let cling shadow never touch yet wont let go Anything still lost boy drowning darkness immature good person even close yet make happy dont understand cant even maintain normal friendship could ever hold onto love dreams share know never become reality crushes makes want scream dont want lose first love love deepest connection ever known feel us slipping walk away fear wont survive cannot bear weight stay pain grow know supposed hell supposed dont want let go never find someone like Never

title: Ect Med Induced Depression Anhedonia
content: heard Electroconvulsive Therapy ECT highly effective treatmentresistant depression also came across someone suffered medicationinduced anhedonia ECT able reverse wonder treatment could work share full story try cover relevant details Three years ago prescribed Antipsychotic Brexpiprazole felt like bullet headit completely destroyed life even though issues taking result developed severe depression total anhedonia intense burning sensation head Later experienced relief Sertraline Aripiprazole unfortunately stopped working time Since tried 20 different medications available country sadly none helped Life become unbearableI cant work study entire life ruined stagnant suggest ECT worth risk List medications tried Antidepressants Sertraline Venlafaxine Desvenlafaxine Clomipramine Paroxetine Mirtazapine Fluoxetine Olanzapine Amitriptyline Fluvoxamine Bupropion Tianeptine Antipsychotics Aripiprazole Risperidone Amisulpride Medications Cerebrolysin Amantadine Pramipexole Rasagiline

title: recover shutdown
content: Hello fellow redditors 25M suffering mental health issues anxietydepression entire life However since November mental health downhill trend past couple weeks bad weekend particular nearly unbearable feel Ive lost passion life everything dont energy become isolated since graduating college four years ago feel flame inside died dont know reignite exacerbated depression prospect new job Ive searching new job since November recently found one Id normally excited pays three times current salary field always piqued interest Unfortunately hasnt case Ive worked current role three years spoiled much flexibility current employer small weekly newspaper small theres four us office one comes daily basis mornings Ive unfortunately lost rhythm worked less less Im supposed full time average logged 35ish hours week Since November Ive 2025 hours week counting weeks completely shut couldnt work Ive burned journalism hoping find basic bridge job till could find something permanent Complicating matters cannabis addiction Ive working trying curb quit couple weeks preemployment UA new job unfortunately relapsed afterward havent even heard results yet Thus Ive extremely apprehensive new job writing utility company one hand Id financially set hand big transition working 8 am430 pm five days week office mention getting adjusted content write dont passion Despite usual alley havent able muster excitement new position nothing worry fear failing job passion isnt least journalism havent felt passionate anything Usual interests hobbies havent piqued interest havent felt like anything write dont even know Ill able go work tomorrow since literally feel like lying bed day However lay watch TV ruminate job alternatives idea else life things beyond control feel big part mental health decline caused ongoing political turbulence United States passive suicidal ideation Nothing serious mainly wanting go sleep wake Part feels like way situation death also know mental health cyclical pit despair Ill eventually get wake reignite passion living hopefully get passion journalism back stop ruminating get energywillpower force back world get life back track could go want relief depression hope things improve eventually Ive tried breathingrelaxation techniques local behavioral health crisis center suggested today work little bit ruminating starts back help would greatly appreciated Sorry short novel thanks advance

title: cant motivate anymore
content: Hi Ive trying figure way mental state feel like getting worse Heres situation Im 20F grew abusive household entire life Despite always Agrade student got told great future laid ahead would study something uni would get job good money later hope clung onto Corona situation got worse probably dont tell times especially difficult people live toxic homes sleeping schedule got messed point hasnt fixed today spent time playing video games PC felt general decline health finally graduated thrilled apply uni finally get Turns Although university general free country studies interested provided private unis needed lot cash didnt grades worked hard didnt matter Great great Meanwhile situation home got unbearable day wanted get tried scholarships Failed Realized cant even get school done anymore bad gotten Needed find another way Thankfully BF family wonderful people helped basically flee childhood home night moved lived different countries immigrated could provide us income know generally considered bad decision believe got bad home turned better option Never regretted turning point mental health right Wrong tried finding job Turns English gets nowhere one best English speaking countries world need study language good first motivating got harder harder time Decided half year ago study home Barely Cant bring Tried least efficient home cleaning Turned exhausting Feels like became enemy Thats general state moment tired exhausted slept 10 hours today still feel way Ive tried fixing sleeping schedule wont work feel like Ive reached breaking point motivation laid initial path life turned lie tried arrange new situation cant manage feel like failure cherry top BF lost job recently also struggling money feel even worse knowing havent provided anything yet wanted learn language find job matter 6 months 15 years Told therapist response force try harder Yeah thanks like havent done exactly ENTIRE LIFE got nowhere might already figured Im angry Im angry frustrated efforts amount nothing put much work things life respond spitting face drained mental health much feel incapacitated even comes simple tasks like taking shower Im sick Sick life advice
